asr: 果珍李柰，菜重芥姜。海咸河淡，鳞潜羽翔。龙师火帝，鸟官人皇。始制文字，乃服衣裳。推位让国，有虞陶唐。吊民伐罪，周发殷汤。坐朝问道，垂拱平章。
s2tt:
Fruits are prized like plums and apples, 
Vegetables are valued as mustard and ginger. 
The sea is salty and the river is fresh, 
The fish swims and the bird flies. 
The dragon master and the fire emperor, 
The bird official and the human sovereign. 
They began to create characters, 
And then to wear clothes. 
They abdicated and yielded the throne, 
Like Yu Shun and Tang Yao. 
They comforted the people and punished the guilty, 
Like King Wu of Zhou and Tang of Shang. 
They sat in court to inquire about the way, 
And ruled with folded hands in peace and order.
s2tt_r:
果真李奈蔡仲介将海咸河淡
林浅鱼翔龙狮火地鸟观人黄
史志文字乃服衣裳
推位让国有虞陶唐
吊民伐罪周发殷汤
坐朝问道垂拱篇章

译文：
Guru Li, Nai, Cai, Zhong, and Jia,
Carrying the salt of the sea and the freshness of the river.
In shallow forests, fish swim, dragons and lions, fire and earth, birds and humans, all yellow.
Historical records and texts, clothing and attire.
Abdication and succession, Yu, Yao, Tang, and Tang.
To吊民伐罪, Zhou, Fa, and Yin, Tang.
Sitting in court, asking questions, governing through inaction, chapters and articles.

asr: 爱育黎首，臣伏戎羌。遐迩一体，率宾归王。鸣凤在竹，白驹食场。化被草木，赖及万方。盖此身发，四大五常。恭惟鞠养，岂敢毁伤。女慕贞洁，男效才良。
s2tt_r:
原文：
爱育黎首，臣伏戎羌。遐迩一体，率宾归王。鸣凤在竹，白驹食场。化被草木，赖及万方。盖此身发，四大五常。恭惟鞠养，岂敢毁伤。女慕贞洁，男效才良。知我者，谓我心臧。

译文：
Love nurtures the common people, subjects submit to the king. Far and near as one, all return to the sovereign. A phoenix sings in the bamboo, a white horse grazes in the field. Its influence spreads to all the grasses and trees, benefiting the myriad regions. This body and hair, the four elements and five constants. With great respect, I nurture and raise, how dare I damage them. Women admire virtue and purity, men emulate talent and goodness. Those who know me, say I am virtuous.

asr: 知过必改，得能莫忘。罔谈彼短，靡恃己长。信使可覆，器欲难量。墨悲丝染，诗赞羔羊。景行维贤，克念作圣。德建名立，形端表正。空谷传声，虚堂习听。
s2tt_r:
原文：
知过必改，得能莫忘。
妄谈彼短，弭事几长。
信实可复，器欲难量。
莫悲斯染，师赞羔羊。
谨行难为贤，克念作圣。
德建名立，行端表正。
空谷传声，虚堂习听。

译文：
Know mistakes and correct them, remember abilities.
Talk about others' shortcomings, avoid causing trouble.
Truth can be restored, but desires are hard to measure.
Don't grieve over being tainted, praise like a lamb.
Being cautious is hard to become a sage, but overcoming desires can make one holy.
Build virtue and establish a name, act upright and set an example.
Echoes in the empty valley, lessons learned in a spacious hall.

asr: 祸因恶积，福缘善庆。尺璧非宝，寸阴是竞。资父事君，曰严与敬。孝当竭力，忠则尽命。临深履薄，夙兴温凊。似兰斯馨，如松之盛。川流不息，渊澄取映。
s2tt:
Disaster springs from vice's store;
Blest is the good man evermore.
A foot-long gem is no true treasure;
But time is worth our utmost measure.
Serve well your parents, serve the throne;
With reverence and respect alone.
Do filial duty with your might;
Serve sovereign with your life and might.
As if on brink of deep abyss,
As treading upon thin ice,
Rise early, make the bed at night,
To keep your parents warm.
Be fragrant as the orchid bright,
And flourish like the pine in storm.
As a stream flows unceasingly,
Be clear as a pool for all to see.
s2tt_r:
原文：
或因恶积，福缘善庆；
尺璧非宝，寸阴是竞。
资父事君，约言与敬；
孝当竭力，忠则尽命。
临深履薄，夙兴温凊；
似兰斯馨，如松之盛。
川流不息，渊澄取映。

译文：
Or due to evil deeds, blessings come from good deeds;
A foot of jade is not precious, an inch of time is a contest.
Serving parents and respecting rulers, keeping promises and showing respect;
Honor requires full effort, loyalty demands giving one's life.
Approaching danger with caution, rising early to serve and keeping the house warm;
As fragrant as orchids, as flourishing as pines.
Flows never cease, clear waters reflect the sky.

asr: 容止若思，言辞安定。笃初诚美，慎终宜令。荣业所基，籍甚无竟。学优登仕，摄职从政。存以甘棠，去而益咏。乐殊贵贱，礼别尊卑。上和下睦，夫唱妇随。
s2tt:
In mien and look, profound and still,
In speech, with calm and tranquil will.
Sincerity from start is fine,
A perfect end will make it shine.
For glory and career's foundation,
Esteem gains endless admiration.
When learning excels, office is won,
To serve in court when duty's done.
Like pear tree kept for memory sweet,
Praised more when one has left the seat.
Music differs by rank and station,
Rites tell the noble from base relation.
Both high and low live in accord,
Husband sings and wife echoes his word.
s2tt_r:
原文：
容止若思，言辞安定。笃初诚美，慎终宜令。荣业所基，籍甚无竟。学优登仕，摄职从政。存以甘棠，去而益咏。乐殊贵贱，礼别尊卑。上和下睦，夫唱妇随。

译文：
Appearance and demeanor reflect deep thought,
Words are steady and composed.
Starting with sincerity is beautiful,
Ending with caution is fitting.
Success and prosperity are based on this,
Their fame never ends.
With excellent learning, one can enter officialdom,
Taking on duties and serving the state.
Remaining with the good, one is cherished,
Leaving behind, one is sung of.
Music varies by status,
Rituals distinguish between high and low.
Harmony above and below,
Husband and wife follow each other.

asr: 守真志满，逐物意移。坚持雅操，好爵自縻。都邑华夏，东西二京。背邙面洛，浮渭据泾。宫殿盘郁，楼观飞惊。图写禽兽，画彩仙灵。丙舍旁启，甲帐对楹。
s2tt:
True to self, the heart's content is found;
Chasing things, the mind will drift around.
Hold fast to virtues noble and refined,
And honors will of themselves be aligned.
The capital cities, splendid and grand,
East and West, two capitals stand.
Back to Mount Mang, facing Luo's stream,
Wei and Jing rivers, a watery dream.
Palaces rise, majestic and high,
Towers and pavilions touch the sky.
Beasts and birds in paintings come alive,
Immortals and spirits in colors thrive.
Side chambers open wide and free,
Facing pillars, curtains gracefully.

asr: 肆筵设席，鼓瑟吹笙。升阶纳陛，弁转疑星。右通广内，左达承明。既集坟典，亦聚群英。杜稿钟隶，漆书壁经。府罗将相，路侠槐卿。户封八县，家给千兵。
s2tt:
Feasts are spread with music grand,
Guests ascend by steps at hand.
Stars like caps in brilliance gleam,
Left and right the halls outstream.
Classics rare and talents bright,
Scripts in varied forms alight.
Statesmen throng the courtly scene,
Fiefs with guards of proud demesne.
s2tt_r:
原文：
四言设席，鼓瑟吹笙。
声接纳币，便转移心。
右通广内，左达承明。
既集坟典，亦聚群英。
杜皋中立，七书必经。
辅罗将相，陆贾怀清。
户封八县，家给千兵。

译文：
Four lines set the table, drums and flutes play.
Sound connects with gifts, easily shifting hearts.
Right connects with Guang Nei, left reaches Cheng Ming.
Both gather ancient classics, also gather a group of heroes.
Du Gao stands upright, seven books must pass.
Assists and embraces generals and ministers, Lu Jia holds purity.
House seals eight counties, family gives a thousand soldiers.

asr: 孟轲敦素，史鱼秉直。庶几中庸，劳谦谨敕。聆音察理，鉴貌辨色。贻厥嘉猷，勉其祗植。省躬讥诫，宠增抗极。殆辱近耻，林皋幸即。两疏见机，解组谁逼。
s2tt:
Mencius revered the pure and plain,
Shi Yu upheld the upright vein.
To seek the mean, the golden way,
With diligence and humble sway.
To hear the tone and grasp the core,
To read the face and know the lore.
To leave behind a wise design,
And urge the growth of virtue's sign.
Reflect on self, heed warnings told,
When favor swells, resist the bold.
When shame draws near, disgrace in sight,
Retreat to woods, embrace the light.
Two sages saw the timely sign,
Unbound their ties, by no design.
s2tt_r:
梦柯敦肃，始于秉直，庶几中庸，劳千景赤，临阴察理，见貌辨色，宜绝嘉猷，免其支植，省功积戒，宠增抗疾，代辱禁耻，临高信疾，两疏见机，竭阻谁逼。

译文：
Dream柯敦肃，始于秉直，庶几中庸，劳千景赤，临阴察理，见貌辨色，宜绝嘉猷，免其支植，省功积戒，宠增抗疾，代辱禁耻，临高信疾，两疏见机，竭阻谁逼。

asr: 昼眠夕寐，蓝笋象床。弦歌酒宴，接杯举觞。矫手顿足，悦豫且康。嫡后嗣续，祭祀烝尝。稽颡再拜，悚惧恐惶。笺牒简要，顾答审详。骸垢想浴，执热愿凉。
s2tt:
Slumber at noon, repose at night,
On bamboo mat and ivory bed.
With music, wine, and feasts in sight,
We raise our cups and toast ahead.
With hands and feet in dance we sway,
In joy and health we spend the day.
Descendants carry on the line,
With rites for ancestors divine.
We kowtow twice with heads bowed low,
In awe and fear our reverence show.
In letters, brief and clear we write,
In answers, thoughtful and polite.
When dirt and grime the body stain,
We long to bathe and cleanse again.
When heat and fever make us sigh,
We wish for cooling breeze nearby.
s2tt_r:
原文：
昼眠夕寐，蓝笋象床，弦歌酒宴，接杯举觞。脚手顿足，越阈且康，敌后伺隙，祭祀争尝。启嗓再拜，悚惧恐慌，奸谍简要，故答甚详。还构想遇，执热怨凉。

译文：
Day and night, in blue bamboo beds,
Strings of music, wine and feasts spread.
Feet and hands, in rhythm they beat,
Crossing thresholds, health they seek.

In enemy's lair, they wait and watch,
Offerings and sacrifices, they taste.
Voices rise in reverence, they bow,
Fear and panic, they feel and show.

Spies and informants, they gather brief,
Answers, they give, so clear and complete.
Still构想遇，执热怨凉。

asr: 驴骡犊特，骇跃超骧。诛斩贼盗，捕获叛亡。布射僚丸，嵇琴阮啸。恬笔伦纸，钧巧任钓。释纷利俗，并皆佳妙。毛施淑姿，工颦妍笑。年矢每催，曦晖朗曜。
s2tt: Donkeys, mules, colts and calves, Gallop and jump in fright. Thieves and robbers are executed, Captured and put to flight. Lv Bu was good at archery, And Youzi at playing with balls. Ji Kang was good at playing the lute, And Ruan Ji at whistling calls. Meng Tian invented the writing brush, And Cai Lun made paper white. Ma Jun made a wooden figure move, And Ren Gong was good at fishing right. They could settle disputes and help common people, All were excellent and nice. Mao Qiang and Xi Shi were beautiful ladies, Whether they frowned or smiled with grace. Time flies as an arrow, And the sun and moon shed light.
s2tt_r:
原文：
吕罗赌特还月超祥
诸斩盗贼捕获叛王
布射獠丸鸡禽软笑
填笔轮指俊巧人调
诗分隶俗并皆佳妙
茅诗书姿恭贫言笑
年使美催栖晖朗耀

译文：
Lyu Luo Doo Te Huan Yue Chao Xiang
Zhu Zhan Dao Ze Bu He Pan Wang
Bu She Liao Wan Ji Qin Ruan Xiao
Tian Bi Lun Zhi Jun Qiao Ren Tiao
Shi Fen Li Su Bing Jie Jia Miao
Mao Shi Shu Zi Gong Pin Yan Xiao
Nian Shi Mei Cui Qi Hui Lang Yao

asr: 人之初，性本善。性相近，习相远。苟不教，性乃迁。教之道，贵以专。昔孟母，择邻处。子不学，断机杼。窦燕山，有义方。教五子，名俱扬。养不教，父之过。
s2tt:
At life's dawn, nature is good.
All are close, but habits vary.
Without teaching, nature drifts.
Teaching's way lies in constancy.
Mencius' mother chose her neighbor.
When her son slacked, she broke the loom.
Dou of Yanshan had the right method.
His five sons all achieved great fame.
To raise without teaching is the father's fault.
s2tt_r:
人之初，性本善，性相近，习相远。
苟不教，性乃迁，教之道，贵以专。
昔孟母，择邻处，子不学，断机杼。
窦燕山，有义方，教五子，名俱扬。
养不教，父之过。

译文：
At the beginning, human nature is inherently good,
Nature is similar, but habits diverge.
If not educated, nature changes,
Education's way,贵以专, is precious.

In the past, Meng Mu chose a neighbor's place,
Her son did not learn, so she cut the loom thread.
Dou Yanshan had a righteous way,
Teaching five sons, their names were all famous.
If not educated, it is the father's fault.

asr: 教不严，师之惰。子不学，非所宜。幼不学，老何为。玉不琢，不成器。人不学，不知义。为人子，方少时。亲师友，习礼仪。香九龄，能温席。孝于亲，所当执。
s2tt:
If the teacher is not strict, it shows he is lazy.  
If the student does not learn, it is not proper.  
If one does not learn when young, what will he do when old?  
If jade is not polished, it cannot be made into anything.  
If one does not learn, he cannot know righteousness.  
As a child, one should, in his youth,  
Draw close to his teacher and friends, and practice etiquette.  
Xiang, at nine years of age, could warm his parents' bed.  
Filial piety towards parents is something that should be upheld.

asr: 融四岁，能让梨。悌于长，宜先知。首孝悌，次见闻。知某数，识某文。一而十，十而百。百而千，千而万。三才者，天地人。三光者，日月星。三纲者，君臣义。
s2tt_r:
原文：
融四岁，能让梨。弟于长，宜先知。首孝悌，次方闻。知某数，识某文。一而十，十而百。百而千，千而万。三才者，天地人。三光者，日月星。三纲者，君臣义。

译文：
Rong at four, could yield the pear. Younger to elder, should know first. First filial piety, then virtue. Know some numbers, recognize some words. One to ten, ten to hundred. Hundred to thousand, thousand to ten thousand. Three talents, heaven, earth, man. Three lights, sun, moon, star. Three principles, ruler, minister, righteousness.

asr: 父子亲，夫妇顺。曰春夏，曰秋冬。此四时，运不穷。曰南北，曰西东。此四方，应乎中。曰水火，木金土。此五行，本乎数。十干者，甲至癸。十二支，子至亥。
s2tt:
Father and son, affection true;
Husband and wife, harmony due.
Spring, summer, autumn, winter's call,
Four seasons cycle, never stall.
North, south, east, west, the points extend,
Four directions on center depend.
Water, fire, wood, metal, earth's might,
Five elements flow by number's light.
Ten stems, from Jia to Gui they run;
Twelve branches, Zi to Hai, are spun.
s2tt_r:
原文：
父子亲，夫妇顺。曰春夏，曰秋冬。此四时，运不穷。曰南北，曰西东。此四方，应乎中。曰水火，木金土。此五行，本乎数。十干者，甲至癸。十二支，子至亥。

译文：
Father and son are close, husband and wife are harmonious.  
Spring and summer, autumn and winter. These four seasons, their cycles never end.  
North and south, west and east. These four directions, they respond to the center.  
Water, fire, wood, metal, earth. These five elements, they are based on numbers.  
Ten heavenly stems, from甲 to癸. Twelve earthly branches, from子 to亥.

asr: 曰黄道，日所躔。曰赤道，当中权。赤道下，温暖极。我中华，在东北。曰江河，曰淮济。此四渎，水之纪。曰岱华，嵩恒衡。此五岳，山之名。曰士农，曰工商。
s2tt:
The sun's path, the ecliptic line,
The equator, the central sign.
Below the equator, warmth is best,
Our China lies in the northeast.
The rivers, four in grand array,
Guide waters on their destined way.
The mountains, five in lofty pride,
With names and majesty abide.
The scholars, farmers, artisans, and trade,
Four callings by which life is made.
s2tt_r:
约黄道日所缠，约赤道当中权，赤道下温暖极，我中华在东北。约江河，约淮济，此四渎水之迹。约岱华，嵩恒衡，此五岳山之名。约士农，约工商。
译文：
On the yellow path the sun entwines,
On the red path it holds the balance.
Beneath the equator, warmth ascends,
In the northeast, China stands.

Across the rivers, across the seas,
These are the four great waterways.
Mountains of Taishan, Hua, Song, and Heng,
These are the five sacred mountains.
Among the scholars, farmers, and artisans,
These are the professions of the land.

asr: 此四民，国之良。曰仁义，礼智信。此五常，不容紊。地所生，有草木。此植物，遍水陆。有虫鱼，有鸟兽。此动物，能飞走。稻粱菽，麦黍稷。此六谷，人所食。
s2tt:
These four groups, the nation's best,
Benevolence and righteousness professed.
Propriety, wisdom, trust they hold,
These five virtues, steadfast and bold.
From earth spring grass and trees so fair,
These plants thrive in water and air.
With insects, fish, birds, beasts in sight,
These creatures take to air and flight.
Rice, millet, beans, wheat, and grains of gold,
These six crops our hunger withhold.
s2tt_r:
原文：
此四民，国之梁，曰仁义，礼智信。
此五常，不容紊。
地所生，有草木，此植物，遍水陆。
有虫鱼，有鸟兽，此动物，能飞走。
稻粱菽，麦黍稷，此六谷，人所食。

译文：
These four classes, pillars of the state,
仁义礼智信, virtues that never fail.
Five constants, unyielding and true,
Earth's bounty, from grass to tree.
Water and land, where plants do grow,
Insects and fish, birds and beasts, all thrive.
Rice, millet, beans, wheat, and millet,
Six grains, sustenance for all.

asr: 马牛羊，鸡犬豕。此六畜，人所饲。曰喜怒，曰哀惧。爱恶欲，七情具。青赤黄，及黑白。此五色，目所识。酸苦甘，及辛咸。此五味，口所含。膻焦香，及腥朽。
s2tt: Horses, cattle and sheep; chickens, dogs and pigs. These six domestic animals are tended by people. Joy and anger, sorrow and fear; love, hate and desire — the seven emotions are complete. Blue/green, red, yellow, and black and white — these five colors are recognized by the eye. Sour, bitter, sweet, and pungent and salty — these five tastes are perceived by the mouth. Gamey, burnt, fragrant, and fishy and rotten.
s2tt_r:
马牛羊，鸡犬豕，此六畜，人所饲。
曰喜怒，曰哀惧，爱恶欲，七情具。
青赤黄，及黑白，此五色，目所识。
酸苦甘，及辛咸，此五味，口所含。
山椒香，及腥朽，

asr: 此五臭，鼻所嗅。匏土革，木石金。丝与竹，乃八音。曰平上，曰去入。此四声，宜调协。高曾祖，父而身。身而子，子而孙。自子孙，至玄曾。乃九族，人之伦。
s2tt: These five odors are what the nose smells. Gourd, clay, leather, wood, stone, metal, silk, and bamboo are the eight musical sounds. The level tone, the rising tone, the departing tone, and the entering tone are the four tones, which should be harmonized. Great-great-grandfather, great-grandfather, grandfather, father, and oneself; oneself, son, grandson; from grandson to great-grandson and great-great-grandson—these are the nine degrees of kindred, representing the human relationships.
s2tt_r:
原文：
此五臭，彼所嗅。
匏土革，木石金。
丝与竹，乃八音。
曰平上，曰去入。
此四声，宜协调。
高曾祖父而身，
身而子，子而孙。
自子孙，至玄曾，
乃九族，人之伦。

译文：
These five odors, others smell.
Gourd, earth, leather, wood, stone, gold.
Silk and bamboo, eight sounds they hold.
Pinyin's tones, four they unfold.
This harmony, four tones unfold.
Ancestors, parents, and I,
I, children, children, grandchildren.
From grandchildren, to great-grandchildren,
Nine generations, human relationships.

asr: 父子恩，夫妇从。兄则友，弟则恭。长幼序，友与朋。君则敬，臣则忠。此十义，人所同。当师叙，勿违背。斩齐衰，大小功。至缌麻，五服终。礼乐射，御书数。
s2tt:
Father and son, affection true;
Husband and wife, in harmony pursue.
Elder brother, kind and fair;
Younger brother, with respect and care.
Elders and juniors, order clear;
Friends and companions, sincere and dear.
The ruler, revered with grace;
The subject, loyal in his place.
These ten duties, all should know,
In proper order taught to grow.
From mourning coarse to fine attire,
Five grades of grief, as rites require.
Rites, music, archery, and ride,
Writing and numbers, side by side.
s2tt_r:
原文：
父子恩，夫妇从，兄则友，弟则恭，长幼序，朋与友，君则敬，臣则忠，此十义，人所同，当师叙，勿违背，斩其衰，大小功，至缌麻，五服终，礼乐射，御书数，古六艺，今不具，惟书学，人共遵，既识字，讲说文，有笔画，次章句，读既终，解大义，有疑义，如问对，非正式，勿自专，宽为师，严为友，信为本，习为基。

译文：
Father and son, love and respect,
Husband and wife, harmony and trust,
Brother and friend, kindness and respect,
Young and old, order and respect,
Friends and friends, loyalty and trust,
King and minister, respect and loyalty,
These ten virtues, shared by all,
Should be learned and followed, not violated,
Cutting off the decline,大小功,
To the end of the five degrees, 终,
Rites, music, archery, chariotry, writing, mathematics,
Ancient six arts, now incomplete,
Only calligraphy, universally followed,
After learning words, discuss the "Shuowen",
There are strokes, then chapters and sentences,
After reading, understand the great meaning,
If there are doubts, ask questions and answer,
Not formal, do not act alone,
Be lenient as a teacher, strict as a friend,
Trust as the foundation, practice as the base.

asr: 古六艺，今不具。惟书学，人共遵。既识字，讲说文。有古文，大小篆。隶草继，不可乱。若广学，惧其繁。但略说，能知原。凡训蒙，须讲究。详训诂，明句读。
s2tt:
Six arts of old, now lost in time.
Yet script we learn, in every clime.
Words known, we probe their form and sound,
In ancient script, seal styles renowned.
Then cursive script and clerkly hand,
Each in its place, we understand.
To learn too wide brings fear and strife,
But grasp the source, and know the life.
To teach the young, take earnest care,
Explain each word, make meanings clear.
s2tt_r:
古六艺，今不具，唯书学，人共尊。既识字，讲说文，有古文，大小篆，隶草，既不可乱。若广学，惧其繁，但略说，能知源。凡训蒙，须讲究，详训诂，明句读。
译文：
Ancient six arts, now gone, only calligraphy remains, highly revered by all. Once you know the characters, study "Shuowen," with its ancient script, large and small seal script, clerical script, and cursive script, which must not be confused. If you learn widely, you fear the complexity, but a brief explanation can reveal the source. For teaching young minds, pay attention to detail, explaining the meanings clearly and marking the pauses.

asr: 为学者，必有初。小学终，至四书。论语者，二十篇。群弟子，记善言。孟子者，七篇止。讲道德，说仁义。作中庸，子思笔。中不偏，庸不易。作大学，乃曾子。
s2tt:
The learner must begin with care,
From primers to the Four Books rare.
The Analects, in chapters twenty,
Record the words of sages plenty.
The Mencius, in seven parts,
Teaches morals and virtuous arts.
The Doctrine of the Mean, by Zi Si's hand,
Stands balanced and firm, as it was planned.
The Great Learning, by Zengzi's might,
Guides learners toward wisdom's light.
s2tt_r: 为学者必有初，小学终。四书《论语》者，二十篇。群弟子既善言《孟子》者，七篇止。讲道德，说仁义，作《中庸》子思笔。中不偏，庸不易，作《大学》乃曾子。

asr: 自修齐，至平治。孝经通，四书熟。如六经，始可读。诗书易，礼春秋。号六经，当讲求。有连山，有归藏。有周易，三易详。有典谟，有训诰。有誓命，书之奥。
s2tt:
First cultivate the self, then rule the state.
The Classic of Filial Piety mastered,
The Four Books digested,
Then the Six Classics may be read.
The Book of Songs, the Book of History, the Book of Changes,
The Rites, the Spring and Autumn Annals,
These are the Six Classics, to be studied with care.
There is the Lianshan, there is the Guicang,
There is the Zhouyi, three books of change explained.
There are the Canons, the Counsels,
The Instructions, the Announcements,
The Oaths, the Charges,
Profound are the writings of the Book.
s2tt_r:
自修齐至平治，孝经通；四书熟，如六经，始可读。诗、书、易、礼、春秋，号六经，当讲求。有《连山》，有《归藏》，有《周易》。三《易》详，有点《谟》，有《训诰》，有《誓命》。书之奥。

译文：
From self-cultivation to governance, filial piety is understood; 
Four books are well-versed, like the Six Classics, one can begin to read. 
Poetry, books,易,礼,春秋, known as the Six Classics, should be studied. 
There are The Book of Changes, The Book of Changes, The Book of Changes. 
The Three Books of Changes are detailed, with The Book of Changes, The Book of Changes, The Book of Changes.
