I'm lost and can't break free.
s2tt_r:
原文：
永念难消释，孤怀痛自煎。
雨深秋寂寞，愁隐病增加。
夜觉风前思，昏蒙眼上花。
空王应念我，穷子正迷家。

译文：
Enduring thoughts hard to dispel,
Lonely heart torments itself.
Deep autumn rain brings solitude,
Grief hidden, illness grows.
Night's wind stirs thoughts before sleep,
Blurred vision, flowers on eyes.
Empty king should remember me,
Poor wanderer lost in home.

asr: 且维轻舸更迟迟，别酒重倾惜解携。浩浪侵愁光荡漾，乱山凝恨色高低。君驰桧楫情何极，我凭阑干日向西。咫尺烟江几多地，不须怀抱重凄凄。
s2tt:
A light boat lingers slow and slow;
Once more we drink before we go.
The waves of grief in ripples spread;
The hills of woe loom overhead.
How deep your love when you sail east!
I lean on rails till day has ceased.
The mist-veiled stream is not so wide.
Why should we grieve on either side?
s2tt_r:
原文：
且为清歌更迟迟，别酒重倾惜解携。
浩浪轻愁光荡漾，乱山凝恨色高低。
君驰贵疾情何极，我凭阑干日向西。
咫尺燕江几多地，不须怀抱重凄凄。

译文：
And sing a clear song with lingering grace,
Pouring the farewell wine, regretting our parting.
The vast waves carry light sorrow, rippling,
The chaotic mountains hold deep hatred, high and low.
Your journey is swift, your passion boundless,
I lean on the railing, the sun sets westward.
A few miles to Yanjiang, how much land,
No need to hold sorrow, deeply sad.

asr: 何荆州坏焚书二语，先后一辙也。诗以慨之。牙签万轴裹红绡，王粲书同付火烧。不于祖龙留面目，遗篇那得到今朝。
s2tt:
Two lines of verse, two fires of the same kind,
I write this poem with a heavy mind.
Ten thousand scrolls in silk and red tags bound,
Like Wang Can's works, to ashes fell around.
Had not the First Emperor spared some from flame,
How could these ancient texts survive in fame?
s2tt_r:
原文：
何今朝坏焚书二语先后一辙也，诗以慨之。牙签万轴裹红绡，王粲书同付火烧。不与祖龙留面目，一篇哪得到今朝。

译文：
Why are the words "burn books" repeated in the same order today? I write a poem to express my feelings. Ten thousand volumes wrapped in red silk, Wang Can's books are all burned. Without leaving the face of the first emperor, how could a single article reach today?

asr: 寻春须是先春早，看花莫待花枝老。缥色玉柔擎，醅浮盏面清。何妨频笑粲，禁苑春归晚。同醉与闲评，诗随羯鼓成。
s2tt:
Seek spring before spring's in full flight;
View flowers ere flowers fade in sight.
Jade fingers hold cups of jade green;
Wine foams on surface clear and clean.
Why not laugh while you may?
Spring's late in royal garden gay.
Drunk together, we're free to sing
Verses composed to drumbeating.
s2tt_r:
原文：
寻春须是先春早，
看花莫待花枝老。
缥色玉柔情，
帔拂展面清。
何妨频笑粲，
尽愿春归晚。
同醉与闲评，
诗随解骨沉。

译文：
Seeking spring must be early in spring,
Do not wait for the flower branches to grow old.
Gossamer-like color, jade-like tenderness,
Gown flutters, face clear.
Why not laugh often,
Wishing for spring to linger.
Drunk and at ease, we comment,
Poetry sinks with the bone.

asr: 不到嵩阳动十年，旧时心事已徒然。一二故人不复见，三十六峰犹眼前。夷门二月柳条色，流莺数声泪沾臆。凿井耕田不我招，知君以此忘帝力。山人好去嵩阳路，惟余眷眷长相忆。
s2tt:
Ten years since I left Songyang's height,
My youthful dreams have taken flight.
Old friends are gone, no more in view,
Yet thirty-six peaks still stand true.
At Yimen Gate, willows in spring hue,
Orioles' songs bring tears anew.
You till the fields, draw water clear,
Forgetting royal power here.
Go to Songyang, your mountain home,
While I in lasting memory roam.
s2tt_r:
不到松阳动十年，旧时心事已徒然。
一二故人不复见，三十六峰犹眼前。
移门二月柳条色，留阴数深泪沾臆。
早景耕田不我招，知君以此望帝力。
山人好去松阳路，惟余眷眷长相忆。

译文：
Ten years have passed since I last saw Songyang,
The old heart's desires now seem in vain.
No longer see my old friends, only thirty-six peaks remain.
In February, the willow's color moves,
Shadows deep, tears stain my heart.
Early morning, the fields call not to me,
I know you look to the emperor's power.
Go well on your way to Songyang's path,
Only my lingering thoughts will always linger.

asr: 柳色惊心事，春风厌索居。方知一杯酒，犹胜百家书。
s2tt:
Willow green saddens my heart;
Spring wind hates my lonely part.
Now I know a cup of wine
Is better than books divine.
s2tt_r:
柳色惊心事，春风燕所居。方知一杯酒，犹胜百家书。
译文：
The willow's green stirs the heart,
Spring wind, where the swallows rest.
A single cup of wine,
Outshines a hundred books.

asr: 昔日京华去，知君才望新。应犹作赋好，莫叹在官贫。且复伤远别，不然愁此身。清风几万里，江上一归人。
s2tt:
Once in the capital you go,
Your talent and fame will surely grow.
Your verses will be praised with pride,
Though poor in office, don't be sighed.
Yet parting grieves the heart so deep,
Or else life's sorrows make us weep.
The breeze blows miles and miles with grace,
A soul returns to riverside place.
s2tt_r:
昔日京华去，
知君才望新。
应犹作父好，
莫叹在官贫。
且复伤远别，
不然愁此身。
清风几万里，
江上一归人。

译文：
Long ago, I left the capital,
I know your talent is new.
You should still be a good father,
Don't sigh at being poor in office.
I also feel sad about the long separation,
Otherwise, I would be worried about my life.
The clear wind blows for thousands of miles,
A lone returner on the river.

asr: 朝登百丈峰，遥望燕支道。汉垒青冥间，胡天白如扫。忆昔霍将军，连年此征讨。匈奴终不灭，寒山徒草草。唯见鸿雁飞，令人伤怀抱。晋武轻后事，惠皇终已昏。
s2tt_r:
原文：
朝登百丈峰，遥望燕支道。
汉垒清明白，胡天白如扫。
忆昔霍将军，连年此征讨。
匈奴终不灭，寒山徒草草。
唯见鸿雁飞，令人伤怀抱。
尽古清后世，晦黄终已昏。

译文：
In the morning I climb the hundred-foot peak,
And gaze afar at the Yanchi Road.
The Han fortresses stand clear and white,
While the Huns' sky is as white as扫.
I recall General Huo,
Who fought here year after year.
The Huns will never be extinguished,
And the cold mountains are but grass.
Only the wild geese fly by,
Leaving sorrow in my heart.
From ancient times to the present,
The light has dimmed and the yellow has faded.

asr: 豺狼塞瀍洛，胡羯争乾坤。四海如鼎沸，五原徒自尊。而今白庭路，犹对青阳门。朝市不足问，君臣随草根。
s2tt:
Wolves and jackals block the Luo and Chan streams,
The Tartars fight for the world, it seems.
The four seas seethe like a boiling pot,
The five plains in vain their pride have got.
Now the road to the White Court lies bare,
Still facing the gate of the sun so fair.
The court and the market need no more be sought,
The monarch and his men with grass are wrought.
s2tt_r:
原文：
豺狼塞瀍洛，胡羯争乾坤。
四海如鼎沸，五原徒自尊。
而今白亭路，犹对青阳门。
朝市不足问，君臣随草根。

译文：
Chains and wolves block the path,
Huns and Turks vie for power.
The seas boil like a pot,
Five regions vainly claim their might.
Now on the White Pavilion Road,
Still facing the Green Sun Gate.
The court and market are not worth asking,
King and minister follow the grass roots.

asr: 鸟道几登顿，马蹄无暂闲。崎岖出长坂，合沓犹前山。石激水流处，天寒松色间。王程应未尽，且莫顾刀环。
s2tt_r:
原文：
鸟道几登顿，马蹄无暂闲。
崎岖出长坂，河沓游前山。
石激水流处，天寒松色间。
王城音未尽，且莫顾刀环。

译文：
Birds fly on narrow paths, horses trot without pause,
Steep and winding, across long slopes, rivers wide and vast.
Rocks stir the water, cold winds through pines pass,
In the capital's echo, do not look back, for now.

asr: 亭皋正望极，乱落江莲归未得。多病却无气力，况纨扇渐疏，罗衣初索。流光过隙，叹杏梁、双燕如客。人何在？一帘淡月，仿佛照颜色。幽寂，乱蛩吟壁，动庾信、清愁似织。
s2tt:
On the pavilion gazing far and wide,
I see red lotus petals fall far and wide.
Sick, I have no strength to go homeward.
My fan is laid aside,
My silk robe feels cold.
How time flies like a white steed flashing past the crack!
I sigh to see a pair of swallows on the beam
As if they were guests.
Where is she now?
The pale moon shines as if on her fair face.
In solitude,
I hear crickets chirp on the wall,
Which weave a web of sorrow in my heart.
s2tt_r:
原文：
停高正望极，乱落江莲归未得。
多病却无气力，况完善见疏。
罗衣出所，流光过隙，叹性凉。
霜雁如客，人何在？
一帘淡月，仿佛照颜色。
幽寂，乱穷隐蔽，动与信，轻愁四肢。

译文：
At the height, I pause to look afar,
Changeful lotus falls, yet not to return.
With illness, I lack the strength,
And even the perfect see me as distant.

My robe, once worn, now gone,
Time slips like light through a crevice, sighing at my cool nature.
Like autumn geese, I am a guest,
Where are the people?
A faint moonlight, as if reflecting my countenance.
Solitude, hidden in chaos,
Movement and faith, light sorrow in my limbs.

asr: 绍熙辛亥除夕。余别石湖归吴兴，雪后夜过垂虹，尝赋诗云：“笠泽茫茫雁影微，玉峰重叠护云衣长桥寂寞春寒夜，只有诗人一舸归。”后五年冬，复与俞商卿、张平甫、钴朴翁自封禺同载，诣梁溪。
s2tt_r:
原文：
少溪新海除夕，与别石湖归吴兴，雨后夜过垂虹，尝赋诗云：
历子茫茫夜影微，
玉峰重叠护云衣。
长桥寂寞春寒夜，
只有诗人一个归。
后年冬，复于商清张平甫谷浦翁自封于同在，亦良夕。

译文：
On the new year's eve of the new sea,
I bid farewell to the Stone Lake and return to Wuxing.
After the rain, I pass by the hanging rainbow at night,
And once again compose a poem:
The journey is long and the night is dim,
The jade peaks are layered and cloaked in clouds.
The long bridge stands lonely in the cold spring night,
Only the poet returns alone.
The following winter, I am again at the valley of the river in Shangqing,
With Zhang Pingfu,谷浦翁, sharing the same evening,
Also a beautiful night.

asr: 道经吴淞。山寒天迥，云浪四合，中夕相呼步垂虹。星斗下垂，错杂渔火。朔吹凛凛，卮酒不能支。朴翁以衾自缠，犹相与行吟。因赋此阙，盖过旬，涂稿乃定。
s2tt: Passing by Wusong. The hills are chill, the sky remote; clouds and waves merge all around. At midnight we call to each other and stroll on the Rainbow Bridge. The stars hang low, mingled with fishing lights. The north wind blows piercingly; a cup of wine cannot warm us. Piao Weng wraps himself in a quilt, yet we still walk and chant together. Thus I compose this lyric, which, after more than ten days, I revise and finalize.
s2tt_r:
原文：
道经吴淞，山寒天迥，云浪似河，钟兮相呼，不吹虹。星斗下垂，错杂鱼火，朔吹凛凛，至久不能知。仆翁以衾自缠，犹僵于行营。因赋此阙，盖过旬，图稿乃定。

译文：
Passing through Wu Song, mountains are cold and sky vast,
Clouds like rivers, bells call, no rainbow in sight.
Stars and moons hang low, fish lights interlace,
Winter wind blows cold, long night without light.
The old man wraps himself in a quilt,
Still stiff in the camp.
I write this poem, after ten days,
The draft is finally set.

asr: 朴翁咎余无益，然意所耽，不能自已也。平甫、商卿、朴翁皆工于诗，所出奇诡余亦强追逐之。此行既归，各得五十余解。双桨莼波，一蓑松雨，暮愁渐满空阔。
s2tt: Old Pu reproached me as being of no use; yet my mind was engrossed and I could not help myself. Pingfu, Shangqing, and Old Pu were all skilled in poetry, and I too eagerly pursued the odd and wondrous things they produced. After this outing we returned, each having gotten over fifty pieces. Twin oars through ch'un-weed waves, a lone straw cloak in the pine rain — evening sorrow gradually filled the vast emptiness.
s2tt_r:
原文：
普翁救于无益，然亦所耽，不能自已也。贫富商卿，普翁皆攻于诗，所出奇诡，予以意强追逐之。此行既归，各得五十余解。霜降春波，一蓑松雨，暮愁渐满空阔。

译文：
Poetry rescues the poor, yet it's a passion, hard to let go. Rich and poor, merchants and nobles, all attack poetry, creating the bizarre. I pursue with intent, chasing the essence. This journey returns, each gaining fifty interpretations. Frost descends, spring waves, a cloak of pine rain, evening sorrow fills the vastness.

asr: 呼我盟鸥，翩翩欲下，背人还过木末。那回归去，荡云雪、孤舟夜发。伤心重见，依约眉山，黛痕低压。采香径里春寒，老子婆娑，自歌谁答？垂虹西望，飘然引去，此兴平生难遏。
s2tt:
Calling my gulls, they seem to fly down in a dance,
But over the treetops they turn their back at a glance.
Last time I went away,
My lonely boat sailed by night through cloud and snow white.
Now I see again with broken heart
The eyebrows-like mountains loom low, part by part.
In the sweet-scented pathway blows chilly spring breeze;
What can I do but sing at ease?
Who will respond to me?
I look west to the Rainbow, leaving it far away.
How can I curb my lifelong fancy for it today?
s2tt_r:
原文：
忽梦鸥鸟翩翩欲下，
被人还过暮莫。
那回归去，荡云雪，
孤舟夜发，伤心重见。
依约眉山黛痕低压，
此乡尽里春寒，
老此婆娑，此歌谁答？
垂虹西望，飘然隐去，
此性平生难遏。

译文：
Suddenly dreaming of seagulls gracefully descending,
Only to be passed by at dusk.
That return journey, amidst clouds and snow,
A solitary boat departs at night, heart heavy with reunion.
Faintly, the brow of the mountain, a low trace of黛,
This hometown, all spring cold,
Old and swaying here, whose song answers?
Looking west at the hanging rainbow, drifting away,
This nature, unquenchable throughout life.

asr: 酒醒波远，正凝想、明挡素袜。如今安在？惟有阑干，伴人一霎。
s2tt:
Awake, I find waves far away;
I muse on her bright rings and hose of yesterday.
Where is she now?
Only the rails remain,
To share with me a moment's pain.
s2tt_r:
原文：
骤雨初歇，枕上闻鸡鸣。明灯数盏，如今安在？唯有栏杆伴人一霎。

译文：
A sudden rain has just ceased,
And the rooster crows on the pillow.
Several lamps are lit,
But where are they now?
Only the railing remains,
Accompanying a person for a moment.

asr: 溪边白鹭，来吾告汝。溪里鱼儿堪数。主人怜汝汝怜鱼，要物我、欣然一处。白沙远浦，青泥别渚。剩有虾跳鳅舞。听君飞去饱时来，看头上、风吹一缕。
s2tt:
By the stream, white egret, I tell you true:
The fish in the stream are few.
My master loves you, you love fish too;
Let's share joy, me and you.
White sand on distant shore,
Green mud on isle's floor,
Shrimps leap and loaches dance galore.
Fly off and feast, then back you soar,
See on my head, wind blows a lock once more.
s2tt_r:
原文：
西边白鹭来无告汝，
西里鱼儿堪数。
主人怜汝汝怜鱼，
要悟我心然一处。
白沙原浦青泥别处，
设有虾跳秋雾。
请君飞去保时来，
看头上风吹一缕。

译文：
White herons come from the west without warning,
Fish in the west can be counted.
The master loves you, you love the fish,
To understand my heart is one place.
White sand and green mud in different places,
Shrimp jump in autumn mist.
Please fly away to stay,
Look at the wind blowing a strand.

asr: 读渊明诗不能去手，戏作小词以送晚岁躬耕不怨贫，只鸡斗酒聚比邻。都无晋宋之间事，自是羲皇以上人。千载后，百篇存，更无一字不清真。若教王谢诸郎在，未抵柴桑陌上尘！
s2tt:
Reading Tao's verse, I cannot part;
In jest I write this song for my old heart.
To farm in late years, I do not complain;
With fowls and wine, I call on neighbors again.
I care not for what happened in days gone by;
I'm as free as before the earth and sky.
After a thousand years,
His one hundred poems appear.
Not a word but is sincere.
If noble lords were living now,
Could they be compared with dust on his pathway?
s2tt_r:
读渊明诗不能去手，细作小词以送晚岁。躬耕不愿贫，止鸡豆，久居比邻。都无近宋之间事，自是羲皇以上人。千载后百篇存，更无一字不清真。若教王谢诸郎在，未抵柴桑陌上尘。

译文：
Reading Tao Yuanming's poems, I can't let go,
Carefully crafting a small poem to see out the years.
Gleaning and farming, unwilling to be poor,
Just a few dishes of chicken and beans, staying close to neighbors.
No events from near the Song dynasty,
I am a person from before the Yellow Emperor.
A thousand years later, a hundred poems remain,
Each word clear and true, without a single falsehood.
If the sons of Wang and Xie were here,
They would not match the dust on the roads of Chai Sang.

asr: 天上飞琼，毕竟向、人间情薄。还又跨、玉龙归去，万花摇落。云破林梢添远岫，月临屋角分层阁。记少年、骏马走韩卢，掀东郭。吟冻雁，嘲饥鹊。人已老，欢犹昨。
s2tt:
Celestial jade in flight,
Yet finds the world's love slight.
She rides the jade dragon back,
Leaving myriad blooms in wrack.
Clouds part, far peaks o'er treetops rise;
Moon climbs, tiered towers 'neath her eyes.
I recall in youth with hounds I sped,
Through eastern wilds my gallant steed I led.
I mocked wild geese in frozen plight,
And starving magpies' sorry sight.
Though age has come with silvered hair,
My youthful joys still linger there.
s2tt_r:
原文：
天上飞琼碧镜像，
人间琴拨海又跨。
玉龙归去万花摇落，
云破鳞梢天远岫。
月临屋角分层阁，
记上面骏马走寒芦。
仙东郭，银动雁，朝鸡雀。
人倚老，欢犹佐。

译文：
In the sky, flying snowflakes like a mirror,
On earth, a lute plucks the sea and leaps.
The jade dragon departs, petals fall,
Clouds break, scales shimmer, distant peaks.
The moon lights the corner, dividing the layers,
Remembering the top, horses gallop through the cold reeds.
The eastern郭, silver moves, geese, morning chickens and crows.
People lean on the old, joy still accompanies.

asr: 对琼瑶满地，与君酬酢。最爱霏霏迷远近，却收扰扰还寥廓。待羔儿、酒罢又烹茶，扬州鹤。
s2tt:
Upon the jade-like ground, with you I drink and dine.
I love the misty rain that veils both far and near,
Then clears up to restore the boundless sky serene.
When lambs are cooked and tea is brewed after the wine,
We'll ride away like cranes o'er Yangzhou green.
s2tt_r:
原文：
对琼瑶满地，与君酬酢。
最爱非非名远近，
却收扰扰还寥阔。
待高耳，酒罢又烹茶。
扬州鹤。

译文：
On the ground琼瑶满地，
With you, we drink and toast.
The most cherished is the name far and near，
But the disturbance is still vast and wide.
待高耳，酒罢又烹茶。
扬州鹤。

asr: 少日春风满眼，而今秋叶辞柯。便好消磨心下事，莫忆寻常醉后歌。可怜白发多。明日扶头颠倒，倩谁伴舞婆娑。我定思君拼瘦损，君不思兮可奈何。天寒将息呵。
s2tt:
In youth, spring breeze filled the eye;
Now autumn leaves from branches fly.
Let heart's cares fade away,
Forget the songs after wine's sway.
Alas, white hair holds sway.
Tomorrow, dizzy I'll be,
Who'll dance in grace with me?
For you I'll waste away,
If you forget, what can I say?
In cold, rest I pray.
s2tt_r:
原文：
少日春风满砚，
而今秋叶辞柯。
便好消磨心下事，
莫忆寻常醉后歌。
可怜白发多，
明日浮头颠倒，
倩谁伴舞婆娑。
我定思君拼受损，
君不死兮可奈何。
天寒江夕呵。

译文：
In youth, spring breezes filled my inkstone,
Now autumn leaves bid farewell to the tree.
It's good to spend time on my heart's affairs,
Don't recall the usual songs after drinking.
Alas, with much white hair,
Tomorrow, I'll be upside down,
Who can dance with me gracefully?
I'll surely miss you, willing to endure hardship,
You must not die, what can I do?
In the cold evening by the river.

asr: 春风吹船著浯溪，扶藜上读《中兴碑》。平生半世看墨本，摩挲石刻鬓成丝。明皇不作苞桑计，颠倒四海由禄儿。九庙不守乘舆西，万官已作鸟择栖。抚军监国太子事，何乃趣取大物为？
s2tt:
Spring breeze wafts my boat to Wu Stream's side,
I climb with cane to read the Tablet of Revival with pride.
For half my life I've pored o'er copies in vain,
Now touch the stone, my hair turns gray again.
The emperor failed to guard his heritage,
Let rebels run rampant and wreck the age.
The royal temples lost, the court took flight,
Officials like birds sought branches in plight.
The crown prince should assist, not seize the throne,
Why rush to grasp the scepter all alone?
s2tt_r:
原文：
春风吹传浊无息，
拂篱上独中心悲。
平生半事看墨本，
摩挲石刻并沉思。
明皇不作包桑计，
颠倒四海由鹿儿。
九庙不守成于西，
万官已作鸟择栖。
辅君兼国太子事，
何奈屈取大物为。

译文：
Spring breeze blows, spreading without end,
Whispers through the fence, a solitary sorrow.
A lifetime spent in ink's embrace,
Strokes of stone, a deep reflection.
Emperor Ming did not plan for the future,
The world turned upside down by a young deer.
Nine temples lost, in the west,
Ten thousand officials, birds choose their nests.
Assisting the prince in state affairs,
Why must one bend to the great?

asr: 事有至难天幸耳，上皇蹰蹐还京师。内间张后色可否，外间李父颐指挥。南内凄凉几苟活，高将军去事尤危。臣结春秋二三策，臣甫杜鹃再拜诗。安知忠臣痛至骨，世上但赏琼琚词。
s2tt_r:
原文：
世有至难天幸耳
上皇除疾还京师
内奸张后色可否
外奸李复宜指挥
南内凄凉饥苟活
高将军去事犹危
臣结春秋二三策
臣抚杜鹃再拜诗
安知忠臣痛至骨
世上但赏穷居词

译文：
There are times when the world is in dire straits, yet heaven consents.
The emperor cures his illness and returns to the capital.
The inner traitor Zhang's appearance is questionable.
The outer traitor Li should be in command.
The south inner court is bleak, with hunger barely surviving.
General Gao's departure leaves affairs still perilous.
I have crafted two or three strategies for the spring and autumn.
I comfort the cuckoo with my poem.
How can I know the pain of a loyal minister to the bone?
The world only appreciates the words of a poor recluse.

asr: 同来野僧六七辈，亦有文士相追随。断崖苍藓对立久，冻雨为洗前朝悲。
s2tt:
With half a dozen monks I came,
And some men of letters in the train.
We stand long facing cliffs clad in green moss;
The frozen rain washes the grief of the past away.
s2tt_r:
原文：
同来野僧六七辈，亦有文士相追随。
断崖苍藓对立久，冻雨为洗前朝碑。

译文：
Six or seven wild monks came together,
With scholars following closely behind.
On the precipice, ancient mosses stand,
As frozen rain washes away the old inscriptions.

asr: 落星开士深结屋，龙阁老翁来赋诗。小雨藏山客坐久，长江接天帆到迟。宴寝清香与世隔，画图妙绝无人知。蜂房各自开户牖，处处煮茶藤一枝。
s2tt_r:
原文：
落星开土生结屋，
龙阁老翁来赋诗。
小雨藏山客坐久，
长江接天翻倒池。
宴寝清香与世隔，
画图妙绝无人知。
风房各自开户牖，
处处煮茶藤一枝。

译文：
Stars fall, earth splits, houses rise,
An old man in the dragon pavilion composes verse.
In the rain, mountains hide, guests sit long,
The Yangtze River connects to the sky, pools turn upside down.
The fragrant banquet is secluded from the world,
Paintings are exquisite, unknown to anyone.
Each wind room opens its windows,
Everywhere, tea is brewed, vines branch out.

asr: 行止千万端，谁知非与是。是非苟相形，雷同共誉毁。三季多此事，达士似不尔。咄咄俗中愚，且当从黄绮。
s2tt:
A thousand ways men go, who knows the right from wrong?
When right and wrong are mixed, praise and blame go along.
This has been so for ages, but sages are not so.
Alas! the vulgar fools, I'll follow the hermits now.
s2tt_r:
行止千万端，谁知非与是。
是非苟相形，雷同共遇悔。
三纪多此事，达士似不尔。
多多俗中语，且当从黄起。

译文：
A thousand ways of movement and rest,
Who knows what is right and what is not?
If right and wrong are compared,
They are alike and shared in regret.
For three years, this has happened many times,
A wise man seems not to be like this.
Many common sayings,
Let's start from the yellow.

asr: 在昔曾远游，直至东海隅。道路迥且长，风波阻中途。此行谁使然？似为饥所驱。倾身营一饱，少许便有馀。恐此非名计，息驾归闲居。
s2tt:
In days of old I traveled far,
To Eastern Sea's remotest shore.
The road was long, the way was hard,
Midst wind and waves my journey slowed.
What drove me on this distant quest?
'Twas hunger's call, a pressing need.
To earn a meal I toiled with zest,
A little gain could well suffice.
Yet fearing this was not the way,
I turned my cart and sought repose.
s2tt_r:
原文：
在昔曾远游，直至东海隅。
道路迥且长，风波阻中涂。
此行谁使然，似为饥所驱。
轻身营一饱，少许便有余。
恐此非名计，栖驾归闲居。

译文：
In the past, I once traveled far,
To the eastern shore of the sea.
The journey was long and distant,
With storms blocking my way.
Who caused this journey?
It seems driven by hunger.
To live lightly, seeking sustenance,
A little is enough.
I fear this is not a wise plan,
So I return to my peaceful abode.

asr: 少年罕人事，游好在六经。行行向不惑，淹留遂无成。竟抱固穷节，饥寒饱所更。敝庐交悲风，荒草没前庭。披褐守长夜，晨鸡不肯鸣。孟公不在兹，终以翳吾情。
s2tt:
In youth I shunned the worldly ways,
In classics I found my delight.
I'm nearing forty years of days,
Yet I have not done deeds bright.
I keep my principle secure,
Though hunger and cold I endure.
My hut is swept by mournful breeze,
With weeds o'ergrown in front of trees.
In coarse garb I wait for the light,
But cocks refuse to herald morn.
Where is the man who knows my plight?
My feelings must be left forlorn.
s2tt_r:
少年罕人事，游好在六经。
行行向不惑，淹留岁无成。
静抱顾穷节，饥寒饱所更。
壁炉焦杯风，荒草没前庭。
披褐守长夜，沉机不可名。
孟公不在兹，终已亦无情。

译文：
Young ones seldom engage in worldly affairs,
Their passion lies in the six classics.
As they journey toward middle age,
Years pass without achieving much.
With a calm heart, they reflect on their poor circumstances,
Fighting hunger and cold, enduring hardship.
The hearth is cold, the cup is empty,
Weeds overgrow the courtyard.
Dressed in rags, they endure the long night,
Their thoughts deep and unspoken.
Benjamin is not here,
His loyalty is already without emotion.

asr: 故人赏我趣，挈壶相与至。班荆坐松下，数斟已复醉。父老杂乱言，觞酌失行次。不觉知有我，安知物为贵。悠悠迷所留，酒中有深味。
s2tt:
My friend who shares my taste in wine
Brings a jug to drink with me.
We sit on pine needles, grass as mat,
And drink until we're drunk, you see.
The elders talk in a jumbled way,
Cups pass without order or care.
I forget myself, lost in the moment,
Unaware of worldly affairs.
Drifting in a haze, I linger on,
For in wine, a deep flavor lies.
s2tt_r:
故人赏我趣，挈壶相与至。
担经坐松下，朔砧已复醉。
父老杂乱言，商酌施行次。
不觉知有我，安知物为贵。
悠悠迷所留，酒中有深味。

译文：
A friend appreciates my interest,
Brings a pot to join the feast.
Carrying scriptures, we sit beneath the pines,
The northern sounds of weaving fill the air.
The elders speak in a jumble,
Discussing and planning with care.
Unaware of my presence,
How can I know what is precious?
In the vastness, lost in thought,
The wine holds deep meaning.

asr: 辛丑正月五日，天气澄和，风物闲美。与二三邻曲，同游斜川。临长流，望曾城。鲂鲤跃鳞于将夕，水鸥乘和以翻飞。彼南阜者，名实旧矣，不复乃为嗟叹。若夫曾城，傍无依接，独秀中皋，遥想灵山，有爱嘉名。
s2tt:
On the fifth day of the first month, the year of Xinchou,
The weather is clear and mild, the scenery serene and fair.
With two or three neighbors, I wander along Slanting Stream anew.
Facing the long river, gazing at the distant mountain's lair.
At dusk, the bream and carp leap with scales aglow,
While water gulls ride the gentle breeze in flight.
That southern hill, its fame and form I've long come to know,
No longer stirs in me a sigh of deep delight.
But this lone peak, standing apart with no companion near,
Solely splendid on the riverside, so proud and clear,
Makes me dream of sacred mountains, far and high,
And cherish its lovely name beneath the vast sky.
s2tt_r:
新丑正月五日，天气澄可，风物鲜媚。余而三邻曲，同游携川，临长流，望曾城。房里岳邻于江西，水鸥沉河，已翻飞。彼南附者，名实就矣，不复乃为嗟叹。若夫曾城，傍无一阶，独秀中高，遥向灵山，有艾嘉名。

译文：
On the fifth day of the first month of the new year, the weather is clear and beautiful, and the scenery is fresh and charming. I am in the company of my neighbors, and we are traveling along the river, looking at the long stream and the city of Zengcheng. The house is located in the west of the river, and the waterfowl are flying over the river. Those who are attached to the south, their names and deeds are already established, and they no longer need to sigh. As for Zengcheng, there is no one around, and it stands alone in the middle of the high place, looking towards the spiritual mountain, with the name of Ai Jia.

asr: 欣对不足，率共赋诗。悲日月之遂往，悼吾年之不留。各疏年纪乡里，以记其时日。开岁倏五日，吾生行归休。念之动中怀，及辰为兹游。气和天惟澄，班坐依远流。
s2tt:
Delight falls short, so we compose in haste.
Grieved by the swift flight of sun and moon,
We mourn our fleeting years, gone all too soon.
Each notes his age and home, the time and place.
The fifth day of the year comes in a flash;
My life will soon be over in a dash.
This thought so stirs my heart that I would fain
Make this excursion while I still remain.
The air is soft, the azure sky is clear;
We sit in groups along the winding stream.
s2tt_r:
原文：
心对不足率共赋诗悲日月之岁往道吾年之不留各书年纪乡里以记其始日开岁数五日吾身行归休念之动中怀及晨为兹游气格天为尘班坐揖远留。

译文：
With heart and mind in harmony, we freely compose poetry, lamenting the passage of time as the sun and moon move on, while my years remain unrecorded. Each of us writes our age and hometown to mark the beginning of the year. On the fifth day of the new year, I return home, my thoughts stirred by the journey. In the morning, I set out for this excursion, the atmosphere and style of the day like dust in the sky, as I sit and bow in reverence, leaving a lasting impression.

asr: 弱湍驰文鲂，闲谷矫鸣鸥。迥泽散游目，缅然睇曾丘。虽微九重秀，顾瞻无匹俦。提壶接宾侣，引满更献酬。未知从今去，当复如此不？中觞纵遥情，忘彼千载忧。
s2tt:
On gentle streams swift carps are gliding;
In quiet vales the gulls are crying.
I gaze afar o'er lakeshore long;
I strain my eyes toward mountains strong.
Though not so high as peaks in pride,
They stand unrivaled far and wide.
With pots of wine I greet my guest;
We drink our fill and have no rest.
I know not since we part today,
If we can meet again this way.
Mid cups I let my fancy fly
Forgetful of ages gone by.
s2tt_r:
原文：
若湍驰文房，弦鼓角鸣讴。
迥则散游目，缅然递增修。
虽微九重绣，顾瞻五匹绸。
提壶接宾侣，盈满更献酬。
未知从今去，当复如此否。
终伤纵摇情，望比千载忧。

译文：
As the swift current rushes through the study,
The strings and drums play, the music flows.
In the distance, eyes wander far and wide,
The scenery gradually grows more beautiful.
Though the embroidery is but slight,
The gaze lingers on the five silk cloths.
Holding a wine pot, welcoming guests,
The cups overflow, offering more in return.
I wonder if from now on,
Will it still be like this?
In the end, I am deeply moved by the emotion,
Looking forward to the sorrow of a thousand years.

asr: 迢迢槐江岭，是为玄圃丘。西南望昆墟，光气难与俦。亭亭明玕照，洛洛清瑶流。恨不及周穆，托乘一来游。
s2tt:
Far, far away stands Mount Huai,
The fairy garden high.
To southwest Kunlun in view,
Its splendor none can outvie.
Bright, bright the jade trees glow,
Clear, clear the blue streams flow.
Alas! I cannot go with the king
To enjoy the beauty of spring.
s2tt_r:
原文：
迢迢怀江陵，适为选谱秋。
西南望昆墟，光气难与俦。
亭亭明干照，落落清瑶流。
恨不及周穆，托乘翼来游。

译文：
Longing for Jiangling afar,
In autumn, I choose the谱.
Looking to the southwest at Kun墟,
The light and aura are unmatched.
Tall and clear, it shines brightly,
Flowing with clear and pure light.
I wish to be like Zhou Mu,
To ride on wings and come to visit.

asr: 白帝城头春草生，白盐山下蜀江清。南人上来歌一曲，北人莫上动乡情。
s2tt_r:
原文：
白帝城头春草生，
白盐山下蜀江清。
南人上来歌一曲，
北人莫上动乡情。

译文：
Spring grass grows on White Emperor's peak,
Sichuan River flows clear by White Salt's peak.
Southerners sing a song,
Northerners, do not stir homesickness.

asr: 今宵帝城月，一望雪相似。遥想洛阳城，清光正如此。知君当此夕，亦望镜湖水。展转相忆心，月明千万里。
s2tt:
Tonight the moon o'er royal town looks like snow white;
Afar I see the same o'er Luoyang City bright.
I know on such a night
You're gazing at the lake in moonlight.
Our longing hearts interlace
O'er miles and miles steeped in moonlight.
s2tt_r:
原文：
今宵帝城月，遥望雪相似。
遥想洛阳城，清光正如此。
知君当此夕，亦望镜湖水。
辗转相忆心，月明千万里。

译文：
Tonight, the imperial city's moon,
Gleams like snow, a distant gleam.
In memory of Luoyang's city,
The light is just as pure and bright.
I know you, in this night,
Also gaze at the mirror lake's light.
In dreams, we miss each other's sight,
The moon shines a thousand miles apart.

asr: 看破空花尘世，放轻昨梦浮名。蜡屐登山真率饮，筇杖穿林自在行。身闲心太平。料峭余寒犹力，廉纤细雨初晴。苔纸闲题溪上句，菱唱遥闻烟外声。与君同醉醒。
s2tt_r:
原文：
看破空花尘世，放轻逐梦浮名。
腊屐登山真率意，琼杖穿林自在行。
身闲心太平，料峭余寒犹历。
帘掀细雨初晴，苔趾闲啼溪上句。
林唱遥闻烟外声，与君同醉醒。

译文：
See through the empty flowers of the world, let go of chasing dreams and fame.
Wearing straw sandals, climbing mountains with true ease, walking through the woods with a jade cane, free and carefree.
With leisure and peace of mind, the lingering chill still lingers.
As the rain clears, the curtain lifts, the mossy path whispers a streamside verse.
From afar, the forest sings, the distant sound of smoke, sharing a drunken awakening with you.

asr: 伛偻溪头白发翁，暮年心事一枝筇。山衔落日青横野，鸦起平沙黑蔽空。天下可忧非一事，书生无地效孤忠。东山七月犹关念，未忍沉浮酒醆中。
s2tt:
Bent by the stream, an old man with hair white,
In twilight years, a staff supports his plight.
The hills hold sunset, green fields stretch afar,
Crows rise from sands, dark wings blot out each star.
The world's concerns are more than one can bear,
A scholar finds no place to show his care.
Though Eastern Hills in July call my mind,
I won't in wine's vain float and drift resigned.
s2tt_r:
原文：
渔父溪头白发翁，
暮年心事一枝筇。
山前落日青横野，
鸦起平沙黑蔽空。
天下可忧非一事，
书生无地效孤忠。
东山七月忧关念，
未忍沉浮酒盏中。

译文：
An old fisherman with white hair by the stream,
In twilight, his heart's burden rests on a single cane.
The setting sun paints the mountains in a deep blue hue,
As crows take flight, darkening the vast sky.

The world's worries are not just one,
A scholar's loyalty finds no place to be shown.
In the month of July, worries of the state weigh heavy,
He cannot bear to float in the depths of his wine.

asr: 溪涨清风拂面，月落繁星满天。数只船横浦口，一声笛起山前。
s2tt_r:
原文：
西上青枫拂面，
月落繁星满天。
数枝船横浦口，
一声笛起山前。

译文：
Westward, the green maple brushes my face,
The moon sets, stars fill the sky.
Several branches of a boat lie across the river mouth,
A flute sound rises from the mountain ahead.

asr: 须如猬毛磔，面如紫石棱。丈夫出门无万里，风云之会立可乘。追奔露宿青海月，夺城夜蹋黄河冰。铁衣度碛雨飒飒，战鼓上陇雷凭凭。三更穷虏送降款，天明积甲如丘陵。
s2tt:
Bristling like hedgehog's quills, his beard appears;
His face, a purple rock, shows lines severe.
A hero's journey knows no bounds of miles,
He'll seize the chance when wind and cloud conspire.
Chasing the foe, he camps by moonlight pale,
On Yellow River's ice, he storms the town.
Through desert rain his iron armor gleams,
War drums on highlands roll like thunder's sound.
At midnight, foes surrender, pleading peace,
By dawn, their piled-up shields like hills abound.
s2tt_r:
原文：
须如魏牟折，面如紫石棱。
丈夫出门无万里，风云之会立可乘。
追奔路宿青海月，夺城夜踏黄河冰。
铁衣度气雨飒飒，战鼓上陇雷频频。
三更穷虏送降款，天明机甲如丘陵。

译文：
Beards like Wei Mu's, faces like purple stones.
A man's journey is not far, the right moment can be seized.
Chasing the wind, sleeping under the moon of Qinghai, 
Treading on the ice of the Yellow River at night.
Iron clothes rustle in the rain, drums beat like thunder.
In the dead of night, the enemy surrenders, 
By morning, armor piled like mountains.

asr: 中华初识汗血马，东夷再贡霜毛鹰。群阴伏，太阳升胡无人，宋中兴。丈夫报主有如此，笑人白首篷窗灯。
s2tt:
First seen in China, the blood-sweat steed,
Then tribute from the east, the frost-feathered eagle.
Dark forces quelled, the sun ascends high,
No northern foe, Song's revival nigh.
Thus heroes serve their land with might,
Laughing at those who age by lamplight.
s2tt_r:
中华初使汉，学马东移再贡霜毛鹰。
裙衣拂太阳，收湖无人送忠心。
丈夫报主有如此，笑人白首蓬窗灯。

译文：
In the early days of China, Han learned to ride horses and later presented frosty-haired eagles.
Their skirts brushed the sun, and they gathered lakes without sending their loyalty.
A man who serves his lord with such dedication, laughs at those who grow old in a simple room with a lamp.

asr: 藜藿盘中忽眼明，骈头脱襁白玉婴。极知耿介种性别，苦节乃与生俱生。我见魏征殊媚妩，约束儿童勿多取。人才自古要养成，放使干霄战风雨。
s2tt:
From coarse greens on my plate, a sudden gleam:
Twin heads of jade, from swaddling clothes set free.
I know their nature, upright as they seem,
Born with a bitter knot, yet straight and free.
I see Wei Zheng's charm, a sight so rare,
And warn the children: "Take with cautious care."
For talents, like these shoots, must grow with time,
To brave the storm and reach the heavens sublime.
s2tt_r:
梨花盘中忽眼明，
骈头托抢白玉英。
及枝梗借重性别苦，
节乃与生俱生。
我见魏征书媚舞，
约束儿童勿多取。
人才自古要养成，
放使干霄战风雨。

译文：
In the plate, pear blossoms suddenly brighten,
Pairing and shining like white jade.
Branches and stems bear the weight of gender's pain,
Their节are born with life.
I see Wei Zheng's book of graceful dance,
Restraining children from taking too much.
Talent has always been nurtured,
Let them soar and battle the wind and rain.

asr: 赤帜插城扉，东君整驾归。泥新巢燕闹，花尽蜜蜂稀。槐柳阴初密，帘栊暑尚微。日斜汤沐罢，熟练试单衣。
s2tt_r:
原文：
赤日插城飞，东军整驾归。
迷心朝燕闹，花尽蜜蜂稀。
槐柳莺初密，帘栊暑尚微。
日斜汤沐罢，熟炼试单衣。

译文：
Red sun pierces the city walls,  
Eastern troops prepare to depart.  
Morning swallows chatter,  
Flowers fade, bees grow scarce.  
Linden and willow,  
Larks sing softly,  
Summer's warmth still lingers,  
Evening sun, bathed,  
Clothes are tried on,  
Sweat still clings to the skin.

asr: 脸上金霞细，眉间翠钿深。欹枕覆鸳衾。隔帘莺百啭，感君心。
s2tt:
On cheeks the golden glow so fine,
Between the brows the dark shade line.
On pillow leaning, quilted in love,
Beyond the screen orioles sing above,
How I'm moved by your love!
s2tt_r:
脸上金霞细，眉间翠钿深。七枕复鸳衾，隔帘鹦鹉啭，感君心。
译文：
Fine gold on her face, deep green on her brow,
Seven pillows and a quilt of love, curtains apart, a parrot sings,
I feel your heart.

asr: 扑蕊添黄子，呵花满翠鬟。鸳枕映屏山，月明三五夜，对芳颜。
s2tt:
Gathering pollen, yellow blooms adorn;
Blowing petals, green hair is born.
Mandarin ducks pillow, screen hills reflect,
On the fifteenth night, moonlight perfect,
Facing her fragrant face, I recollect.
s2tt_r:
原文：
普蕊天黄子，
呵花满翠环。
鸳枕映屏山，
月明三五夜，
对芳颜。

译文：
Purplish buds on yellow branches,
Bloom in a green ring of petals.
Cranes' pillow reflects the screen's mountain,
Under the bright moon on the third and fifth night,
Facing a beautiful face.

asr: 韶光染色如蛾翠，绿湿红鲜水容媚。苏小慵多兰渚闲，融融浦日鵁鶄寐。紫骝蹀躞金衔嘶，堤上扬鞭烟草迷。门外平桥连柳堤，归来晚树黄莺啼。
s2tt:
Dawn's hue dyes moth-brows green and bright,
Where moistened reds on waves delight.
On orchid isle, Su Xiao rests long,
While lovebirds doze in sunset song.
A steed with gold bit neighs and paces,
On mist-veiled bank, the rider races.
Beyond the gate, willows sway by the bridge,
Returning late, he hears orioles on the ridge.
s2tt_r:
原文：
韶光染色如蛾翠，
绿狮红仙水容媚。
苏小拥多兰渚闲，
茸茸浦日娇金媚。
紫流蝶卸金弦思，
堤上扬鞭烟草迷。
门外平桥连柳堤，
归来晚树黄莺啼。

译文：
The spring light colors like emerald,
Green lions and red fairies in water's grace.
Su Xiao holds many orchids in leisure,
Softly the river sun bathes in golden beauty.
Purple flowing butterflies shed golden strings of thought,
On the embankment, the whip stirs the smoke of grass.
Outside the door, the flat bridge connects with willow embankments,
Returning late, the trees are filled with yellow nightingale songs.

asr: 铜鼓赛神来，满庭幡盖裴回。水村江浦过风雷，楚山如画烟开。离别艣声空萧索，玉容惆怅妆薄。青麦燕飞落落，卷帘愁对珠阁。
s2tt_r:
原文：
铜鼓赛神来，满庭翻盖培回。
水村江浦过风雷，楚山如画烟开。
离别橹声空萧索，玉容愁唱妆薄。
青麦燕飞落落，卷帘愁对珠阁。

译文：
Drum beats call the gods, the courtyard fills with reverberating sounds.
In the water village, the riverbank passes through the wind and thunder, the mountains like a painting as the smoke clears.
The parting oars sound empty and desolate, the jade face sings with sorrow, the makeup thin.
Green wheat and flying swallows, rolling and falling, rolling up the curtain to face the pearl pavilion with sorrow.

asr: 骢马金络头，锦带佩吴钩。失意杯酒间，白刃起相雠。追兵一旦至，负剑远行游。去乡三十载，复得还旧丘。升高临四关，表里望皇州。九衢平若水，双阙似云浮。
s2tt_r:
原文：
骢马金络头，锦带佩吴钩。
失意杯酒间，白刃起相仇。
追兵一旦至，复见远行游。
去乡三十载，复得还旧丘。
身高临四关，表里望黄州。
九衢平若水，双阙似云浮。

译文：
A steed adorned with golden gear,
A sword of Wuzhou on his waist.
In a moment of despair,
A sword draws in a toast.
As the enemy approaches,
He sees his journey anew.
Thirty years away from home,
He returns to his old mound.
Standing tall at the four gates,
He gazes at Huangzhou.
The nine avenues are as smooth as water,
The twin palaces float like clouds.

asr: 扶宫罗将相，夹道列王侯。日中市朝满，车马若川流。击钟陈鼎食，方驾自相求。今我独何为，坎壈怀百忧？
s2tt_r:
原文：
浮宫罗将相，家道列王侯。
日中士潮满，车马若川流。
鸡中陈鼎食，方架自相求。
今我独何为，坎壈怀百忧。

译文：
Palace floats with generals and ministers,
Family lines rank with kings and marquises.
Day by day, scholars gather like a tide,
Carriages and horses flow like a river.
Dishes piled high in the kitchen,
Each seeking its own taste.
Now, what am I to do?
I bear a hundred sorrows in my heart.

asr: 一从弃鱼钓，十载干明王。无由谒天阶，却欲归沧浪。仲秋至东郡，遂见天雨霜。昨夜梦故山，蕙草色已黄。平明辞铁丘，薄暮游大梁。仲秋萧条景，拔剌飞鹅鶬。
s2tt:
Once I forsook my fishing rod,  
For ten years I have served the lord.  
No way to reach the heavenly stair,  
I long to go back to waters fair.  
To Eastern Town in autumn I came,  
And saw the frost fall in the name.  
Last night I dreamed of mountains old,  
Where fragrant grass has turned to gold.  
At dawn I left the Iron Hill,  
At dusk I roamed the Town at will.  
In autumn drear and desolate,  
Wild geese and swans fly southward straight.
s2tt_r:
译文：
Once I abandoned fishing,
Ten years of life in vain.
I wander the night streets,
But return to the green waves.

In autumn, I journey to Dongjun,
And see the sky and frost.
Last night, I dreamed of my old mountain,
Where the grass is already yellow.

At dawn, I hold the iron hoe,
And at dusk, I cross the great bridge.
In autumn, the scene is bleak,
And the candlelight is dim.

asr: 幽意无断绝，此去随所偶。晚风吹行舟，花路入溪口。际夜转西壑，隔山望南斗。潭烟飞溶溶，林月低向后。生事且弥漫，愿为持竿叟。
s2tt:
My mind is free from care,
I'll go where'er I please.
The evening breeze wafts my boat
Along the flowery stream.
At night I turn to western vale
And see the Southern Dipper.
The mist-veiled pool spreads far and nigh;
The moonbeams slant on woods behind.
My life is but a floating dream;
I'd be a fisher old.
s2tt_r:
原文：
幽意无断绝，此去随所偶。
晚风吹行舟，花路入溪口。
际夜转西壑，隔山望南斗。
潭烟飞溶溶，林月低向后。
生事且弥漫，愿为持竿叟。

译文：
Endless is the deep meaning,
As I go, my path is free.
The evening breeze stirs the boat,
Flower-lined path leads to the stream's mouth.
At night, I turn to the western valley,
Across the mountains, I gaze at the southern dipper.
Tears rise in the misty潭,
The moon dips low behind the trees.
Life's affairs are vast and wide,
I wish to be a fisherman.

asr: 卖得鲜鱼二百钱，籴粮炊饭放归船。拔来湿苇烧难着，晒在垂杨古岸边。
s2tt:
Two hundred coins for fish I sell,
To buy some rice and cook it well.
The reeds I pull are wet and slow to burn,
So on the ancient bank I let them turn.
s2tt_r:
卖得鲜鱼二百钱，  
抵粮炊饭放归船。  
拔来诗尾烧难着，  
晒在垂杨古岸边。  
译文：  
Sold fresh fish for two hundred coins,  
To buy food and cook, I set sail.  
Pulled the poem's end, hard to light,  
Drying it by the ancient riverside.

asr: 坐看深来尺许强，偏於薄暮发寒光。半空舞倦居然嬾，一点风来特地忙。落尽琼花天不惜，封它梅蕊玉无香。倩谁细橪成汤饼，换却人间烟火肠。
s2tt:
Sitting, I watch the snowflakes thick and deep,
At dusk they gleam with cold light, pure and bright.
Weary of dancing in the air, they sleep,
Yet stir with haste when breezes give them flight.
Heaven spares not jade-like blooms in their fall,
Nor grants the plum buds fragrance, sealed in white.
Who'll knead this snow to make fine noodles all,
To feed our mortal world with pure delight?
s2tt_r:
原文：
坐看深来尺许强，偏于薄暮发寒光。
半空舞倦居然懒，一点风来特地忙。
落尽琼花天不惜，封他梅蕊玉无香。
倩谁细染成汤饼，换却人间烟火尝。

译文：
Watching the snow fall, a foot deep,
In the evening, it shines with cold light.
Halfway up, it tires and rests,
A little wind makes it busy again.
The snow falls, the sky doesn't care,
It seals the plum blossoms, no fragrance.
Ask who can dye it like soup,
To taste the world's烟火.

asr: 梅从山上过溪来，近爱清溪远爱梅。溪水声声留我住，梅花朵朵唤人回。
s2tt_r:
原文：
梅从山上过溪来，
近爱清溪远爱梅。
溪水声声留我住，
梅花朵朵唤人回。

译文：
Mist from the mountains flows across the stream,
Near I love the clear stream, far I love the plum.
The stream's sound calls me to stay,
Plum blossoms beckon me to return.

asr: 不但春妍夏亦佳，随缘花草是生涯。鹿葱解插纤长柄，金凤仍开最小花。
s2tt_r:
原文：
不但春妍夏亦佳，随缘花草是生涯。
露丛解插仙长柄，金凤仍开醉小花。

译文：
Not only is spring beautiful, summer is also fine,
Flowers and plants are life's journey.
In dewy grass, a fairy's long stem is inserted,
A golden phoenix still opens its intoxicating little flower.

asr: 出得西湖月尚残，荷花荡里柳行间。红香世界清凉国，行了南山却北山。
s2tt_r:
出得西湖月上残，
荷花荡里柳行间。
红香世界清凉国，
行了南山却北山。

译文：
Emerging from West Lake as the moon wanes,
Lotus pond with willows in the distance.
A world of red fragrance and coolness,
Walking through South Mountain to North.

asr: 不是人间种，移从月中来。广寒香一点，吹得满山开。
s2tt:
Not of this world, it's grown,
From the moon's sphere it's blown.
A touch of fragrance rare,
Makes all the mountains fair.
s2tt_r:
原文：
不是人间种，移从月中来。
广寒香一点，吹得满山开。

译文：
Not of this world, it came from the moon.
A touch of fragrance from the celestial court,
Blown across the mountains, it blooms in full.

asr: 侯门辞必服，忍位取悲增。去鲁心犹在，从周力未能。家山余五柳，人世遍千灯。莫让金钱施，无生道自弘。
s2tt:
From noble gates, in plain attire I part,
A post of pain, a grieving heart.
Though Lu I leave, my heart stays there,
To serve the Zhou, beyond my care.
Five willows grace my homeland still,
A world lit by lamps on hill.
Let not gold sway the soul's pure quest,
In life's void, the Way finds rest.
s2tt_r:
原文：
鸿门辞壁拂，忍未取杯增。
去路新牛在，丛舟力未能。
家山余五柳，人事变迁登。
莫让金钱失，无声道自宏。

译文：
Leaving the鸿门，拂去壁尘，
忍住未取杯中酒，增添愁绪。
去路新牛在，丛舟力未能。
家山余五柳，人事变迁登。
莫让金钱失，无声道自宏。

asr: 惊风飘白日，忽然归西山。圆景光未满，众星粲以繁。志士营世业，小人亦不闲。聊且夜行游，游彼双阙间。文昌郁云兴，迎风高中天。春鸠鸣飞栋，流猋激棂轩。
s2tt:
Startling winds sweep the sun's bright ray,
Which suddenly sinks in the west.
The moon is not full, I say,
When stars shine at their best.
The ambitious build up their career;
The vulgar have no time to spare.
I'll take a walk far and near
Between twin towers in night air.
The star of letters veiled in cloud,
The wind-tower rises in the sky.
Spring doves on flying roofs sing loud,
And swift wind blows through windows high.
s2tt_r:
原文：
清风飘白日，忽然归西山。
远景光未满，众星灿以繁。
志士营事业，小人亦不闲。
聊且夜行游，游必双阙间。
文昌驭云星，迎风高中天。
春秋名飞动，流标凄零轩。

译文：
A gentle breeze carries the sun,
Suddenly it returns to the west.
The distant light is not yet full,
Stars shine brightly and profusely.
A determined man pursues his career,
Even a small person is not idle.
Let's wander at night,
Wandering must be between two palaces.
The文昌drives the star of clouds,
Facing the wind high in the sky.
Spring and autumn are famous for their movement,
The flowing standard is bleak and empty.

asr: 亮怀玙璠美，积久德愈宣。亲交义在敦，申章复何言！
s2tt:
My heart is bright as jade so fine,
With virtues growing like old wine.
True friendship asks for mutual care,
What more can I say in reply fair?
s2tt_r:
原文：
料怀余反美，积久得玉轩。
清交意在敦，伸张复何言。

译文：
I料想怀有余情，长久积聚得玉轩。
清交意在敦厚，伸张复何言。

asr: 仰彼朔风，用怀魏都。愿骋代马，倏忽北徂。凯风永至，思彼蛮方。愿随越鸟，翻飞南翔。四气代谢，悬景运周。别如俯仰，脱若三秋。昔我初迁，朱华未希。
s2tt:
I look up to the northern breeze,
Thinking of the capital in the north.
I wish to ride a steed of northern breed,
And gallop northward with all speed.
I look up to the southern breeze,
Thinking of the land in the south.
I wish to follow southern birds in flight,
And wing my way southward in sunlight.
The seasons change, the sun and moon go round.
We part in a wink, but three years have passed.
When I left the capital, flowers were red,
But now they have withered and shed.
s2tt_r:
原文：
扬彼硕风，又怀魏都。
愿乘代马，倏忽北徂。
凯风永至，思彼蛮方。
愿随越鸟，翻飞南翔。
四气代谢，悬影运舟。
别如俯仰，托若三秋。
昔我出迁，诸华未西。

译文：
Carry that mighty wind, and miss the capital of Wei.
I wish to ride the horse of Dai, swiftly heading north.
The favorable wind continues, thinking of the barbarian lands.
I wish to follow the birds of Yue, flying southward.
The four seasons change, the shadow moves the boat.
The parting is like a momentary glance, like three autumn days.
In the past, when I left, the Central Plains had not yet set.

asr: 今我旋止，素雪云飞。俯降千仞，仰登天阻。风飘蓬飞，载离寒暑。千仞易陟，天阻可越。昔我同袍，今永乖别。子好芳草，岂忘尔贻。繁华将茂，秋霜悴之。
s2tt:
Now I return, white snows fly high;
Down thousand cliffs, up to the sky.
Drifting like tumbleweed in flight,
I've left behind cold and heat bright.
Cliffs can be scaled, the sky o'erpassed,
But from my comrades I'm outcast.
You love sweet grass, can you forget
The gift you gave? Flowers will fade
When autumn frosts their doom have set.
s2tt_r:
原文：
经我悬指素雪云飞
斧降千仞仰登千阻
风飘蓬飞载离寒暑
千仞易至千阻可越
惜我同袍今永乖别
此浩芳草岂望而已
繁华将茂秋霜翠枝

译文：
With my fingers stretched, snow and clouds fly,
Axes descend a thousand feet, ascending a thousand obstacles.
The wind blows, carrying away the cold and heat of the seasons.
A thousand feet are easy to reach, a thousand obstacles can be crossed.
I cherish my fellow soldiers, now we part forever.
This vast grass, how can I look at it in vain?
Prosperity will flourish, autumn frost will wither the branches.

asr: 君不垂眷，岂云其诚！秋兰可喻，桂树冬荣。弦歌荡思，谁与销忧。临川慕思，何为泛舟。岂无和乐，游非我邻。谁忘泛舟，愧无榜人。
s2tt:
Your love for me is cold, 
How can I prove my heart? 
Orchids in autumn may be told 
From laurels in winter apart. 
I sing to clear my mind, 
But who can clear my care? 
I long for you left behind, 
But who will boat me there? 
Could I not find pleasure 
With neighbors far and nigh? 
Could I forget the leisure 
Of boating with you high?
s2tt_r:
君不垂眷，岂云其诚。
秋兰可喻，桂树冬荣。
弦歌荡思，水与萧忧。
临川慕思，何为泛舟。
岂无和乐，有非我邻。
谁望泛舟，愧吾傍人。

asr: 飞观百余尺，临牖御棂轩。远望周千里，朝夕见平原。烈士多悲心，小人偷自闲。国雠亮不塞，甘心思丧元。拊剑西南望，思欲赴太山。弦急悲声发，聆我慷慨言。
s2tt:
Towers rise a hundred feet high,
By windows I lean on rails nigh.
A thousand miles stretch in my sight,
From dawn to dusk plains lie in light.
The noble grieve for state's plight,
The base in leisure take delight.
Our foe's threat not yet put to flight,
I'd give my life with heart contrite.
Gripping my sword, southwestward I gaze,
To Mount Tai my spirit would blaze.
The tightened strings wail in sad lays,
Hear my impassioned words ablaze.
s2tt_r:
原文：
飞观百余尺，临牖御棂轩。
远望周千里，朝夕见平原。
烈士多悲心，小人偷自闲。
国愁量不塞，甘心思上元。
俯见西南望，思欲附泰山。
贤极悲生发，灵卧慷慨言。

译文：
A towering structure stands a hundred feet high,
By the window, I hold the lattice in my hand.
From afar, I gaze across a thousand miles,
Day and night, I see the vast plains.
Loyal men bear sorrow in their hearts,
While villains seek their own leisure.
National sorrow is vast and deep,
I long to return to the first year.
Looking down, I see the southwest,
I wish to climb Mount Tai.
The virtuous grieve deeply,
The spirit rests in words of passion.

asr: 五剧车声隐若雷，北邙惟见冢千堆。夕阳劝客登楼去，山色将秋绕郭来。寒甚更无修竹倚，愁多思买白杨栽。全家都在风声里，九月衣裳未剪裁。
s2tt:
From street to street the wheels like thunder sound;
On Northern Hills but grave mounds can be found.
The setting sun invites the guest to mount the tower;
Autumn around the town is dyed by hill and bower.
Too cold to lean on bamboo bare,
Too sad, I'd plant white poplars there.
My family shivers in the wind, alas!
In ninth moon winter clothes are not cut, alas!
s2tt_r:
原文：
五更车声隐若雷，
北邙唯见冢千堆。
夕阳劝客登楼去，
山色江秋绕郭来。
寒甚更无休足矣，
愁多思买白杨栽。
全家都在风声里，
九月衣裳未剪裁。

译文：
At five o'clock in the morning, the sound of the carriage隐若雷，
North of the city, only the graves of thousands remain.
The setting sun persuades the guest to climb the tower,
The mountains and rivers, autumn colors, encircle the city.
The cold is so severe that there is no rest,
With so much sorrow, I think of planting white poplars.
The whole family is in the wind,
In September, the clothes have not been cut.

asr: 小寒连大吕，欢鹊垒新巢。拾食寻河曲，衔紫绕树梢。霜鹰近北首，雊雉隐丛茅。莫怪严凝切，春冬正月交。
s2tt:
Minor Cold to Major Cold, the cycle's due,
Joyful magpies build their nests anew.
By winding streams they seek their fare,
With twigs they weave in branches bare.
Frost-hawks northward take their flight,
Pheasants hide in grasses' plight.
Blame not the chill that grips the air,
Spring and winter meet in balance fair.
s2tt_r:
原文：
小寒连大吕，欢鹊垒新巢。
时事寻河曲，纤子绕树梢。
双鹰竞北首，构致隐丛茅。
莫怪严陵切，春冬争月交。

译文：
Small cold connects with great music,
Joyful magpies build new nests.
Seeking the river's bend,纤夫绕树梢。
Two eagles compete for the north, hidden in the thatched cottage.
Don't blame Yanling, spring and winter contend for the moon.

asr: 次吴江，小泊，夜饮僧窗惜别。邦人赵簿携小妓侑尊。连歌数阕，皆清真词。酒尽已四鼓。赋此词饯尹梅津。送客吴皋，正试霜夜冷，枫落长桥。望天不尽，背城渐杳，离亭黯黯，恨水迢迢。
s2tt:
At Riverside, I moor for the night,
And drink to my friend in the lamplight.
A local clerk brings a songstress fair
To sing songs of the poet premier.
When wine is drunk, drums beat the fourth hour.
I write this verse to bid adieu.
I see you off on rivershore,
When frosty night tries coldness more
And maple leaves fall on the Bridge Long.
I gaze on boundless sky,
The town fades out of eye.
The dreary dreary pavilion of adieu
And endless endless river of regret in view.
s2tt_r:
次吴江小泊夜饮僧窗西别方人赵部写小记
又尊连歌数阕皆清真词酒尽已四鼓复此词
见以眉金宋客吴皋正是霜叶冷枫落长桥望天不尽
背城渐杳离亭黯黯恨水迢迢
译文：
At Wujiang, I moored at night,
Drank by a monk's window, bidding farewell to a friend named Fang.
Another cup, a few more songs, all Qingzhun lyrics.
The wine was gone by four o'clock, and I wrote this poem again.
I saw a guest named Song from Wuao with a golden brow.
It was cold, the frost leaves fell on the long bridge,
Looking up at the sky, it seemed endless.
The city receded, the pavilion dim,
Hate the distant waters.

asr: 翠香零落红衣老，暮愁锁、残柳眉梢。念瘦腰、沈郎旧日，曾系兰桡。仙人凤咽琼箫，怅断魂送远，《九辩》难招。醉鬟留盼，小窗剪烛，歌云载恨，飞上银霄。
s2tt:
Green leaves fall, red flowers fade, old is my dress;

Evening sorrows are locked in my brows like willow trees.

I remember my waist slender,

On which you tied your orchid boat tender.

The fairy plays on flute of jade

To see the parting soul off, sad.

Even the elegy can't call it back.

Drunken, she looks back with eyes black

By windowside to cut candlewick.

Her cloudlike song laden with grief

Would fly up to the silver sky.
s2tt_r:
原文：
翠香零落红衣老，暮愁锁残柳眉梢。念瘦腰沈郎旧日，曾系兰桡。仙人凤咽琼箫，唱断魂送远，酒遍南州。醉还留畔，小窗剪烛，歌云在恨，飞上银霄。

译文：
Green fragrance fades, red petals grow old,
Evening sorrow locks the withered willow's brow.
I miss the slim waist of my beloved,
Once tied to the lotus boat.
A fairy sings with a phoenix's voice,
Breaking the soul and sending it far,
Wine spreads across the southern land.
Drunk, I linger by the window,
Cutting candles, singing,
Clouds of sorrow fly up to the sky.

asr: 素秋不解随船去，败红趁、一叶寒涛。梦翠翘，怨鸿料过南谯。
s2tt_r:
原文：
素秋不解随船去，败红衬一夜寒涛。
梦翠桥，怨红料过南桥。

译文：
In素秋's heart, the boat's journey is unknown,
Red petals fall, a cold wave all night long.
Dreaming of the green bridge, the red bridge's sorrow,
Crossing the south bridge, the red petals' sorrow.

asr: 误惊起、风竹敲门，故人还又不至。记琅玕、新诗细掐，早陈迹、香痕纤指。怕因循，罗扇恩疏，又生秋意。西湖旧日，画舸频移，叹几萦梦寐。霞佩冷，叠澜不定，麝霭飞雨，乍湿鲛绡，暗盛红泪。
s2tt:
Startled by the wind-bamboo's knock at the door,
My old friend fails to come as before.
I remember the green bamboo where we wrote new verse,
And the slender fingers left their fragrant trace.
I fear the fan's forgotten, as autumn days grow worse.
On West Lake we rowed from place to place.
How often have I dreamed of those days gone by!
Now her cloud-like robe feels cold, ripples multiply,
And misty rain wets her kerchief of silk,
Which is filled with tears red as milk.
s2tt_r:
原文：
雾惊起，风烛敲门，故人还又不至。
寄栏杆，新诗细掐，早晨记，香痕先止。
怕因循，罗扇恩疏，又生秋意。
西湖旧日，画舸平移，叹几盈梦寐，霞帔冷。
别兰不定，涉霭非雨，乍湿娇绡，暗胜红泪。

译文：
Fog rises, wind chimes at the door, old friends still not come.
Leaning on the railing, new poems carefully crafted, morning memories, fragrance fades first.
Fear of delay, silk fan's favor fades, autumn's chill returns.
West Lake's old days, painted boats glide, sighing how dreams fill, cold in the morning.
Parting from orchids uncertain, through mist not rain, wetting delicate silk, surpassing red tears.

asr: 碧澹山姿，暮寒愁沁歌眉浅。障泥南陌润轻酥，灯火深深院。入夜笙歌渐暖。彩旗翻、宜男舞遍。恣游不怕，素袜尘生，行裙红溅。银烛笼纱，翠屏不照残梅怨。
s2tt:
Blue hills in misty hue,
Evening chill saddens brows of song so few.
On southern path moistened with light rain,
Lanterns light deep courtyard in vain.
As night falls, music warms the air,
Colorful flags wave, dancers with boys' plumes in hair.
Fearless of dust on stockings white,
They stain with mud their red skirts bright.
Silver candles shine through veils of gauze,
Green screens can't light up mume blossoms' flaws.
s2tt_r:
原文：
碧黛衫丝暮寒愁浸歌眉浅，
帐昵喃墨润青酥，灯火深深院。
入夜笙歌渐暖，彩旗帆，疑难舞变，
自游不怕宿袜尘生，行裙红溅，
银烛笼纱，翠屏不照残梅月。

译文：
Beaded silk in twilight's chill,
Sighs seep into the song's pale brow.
In the soft murmur of the tent,
Ink moistens the green paste, deep in the courtyard's light.
As night falls, the music warms,
Colorful flags, sails, and dances change,
Free to roam, unafraid of dust on the shoes,
Red skirts splash, silver candles wrap the gauze,
Green screens do not illuminate the waning moon of plum blossoms.

asr: 洗妆清靥湿春风，宜带啼痕看。楚梦留情未散。素娥愁、天深信远。晓窗移枕，酒困香残，春阴帘卷。
s2tt:
Spring breeze bathes her face, washed clean of rouge and powder,
Yet tear stains still remain.
Her dream of love lingers, not yet faded away.
The moon goddess grieves, for heaven's depth keeps love far.
At dawn, she shifts her pillow by the window,
Wine-drowsy, incense spent, spring shadows veil the curtain drawn.
s2tt_r:
原文：
起妆青叶湿春风，一带啼痕看楚梦。
留情未散素娥愁，天深信远小窗倚枕，酒困香残春阴帘卷。

译文：
Green leaves wet by spring breeze, makeup on,
A line of tears, watching the dream of Chu.
Affection remains,素娥's sorrow deep,
In the far sky, a small window leans, wine-drunk and fragrant, spring curtains roll.

asr: 蟫叶黏霜，蝇苞缀冻，生香远带风峭。岭上寒多，溪头月冷，北枝瘦南枝小。玉奴有姊，先占立、墙阴春早。初试宫黄澹薄，偷分寿阳纤巧。银烛泪深未晓。酒钟悭、贮愁多少。
s2tt:
Silk-worm leaves with frost adhere,
Fly-like buds in cold appear,
Their fragrance wafts on wind severe.
On the ridge the cold is deep,
By the stream the moonbeams creep,
North twigs thin, south twigs small and sheer.
Sister of the fair jade maid
First stands by the wall in shade,
Early spring she has displayed.
She tries light yellow, palace hue,
Steals a touch of beauty new,
Like the princess' forehead true.
Deep in tears the silver candle grieves,
Wine cups hold but sorrow, none perceives.
s2tt_r:
一夜黏霜银苞坠冻，声香远带风峭。林上寒多栖头月冷，北枝瘦南枝小。玉奴有子先占立，强因春早出试宫黄淡泊。偷分寿阳先巧，银烛泪深未晓，酒中千注愁多少。

译文：
One night, frost clings to silver buds,  
Drops fall in cold, a sound that lingers.  
In the trees, the cold holds sway,  
The moon rests, its light subdued.  
Northward, branches lean, southward, they stand.  
A beauty, early, takes its place.  
With spring's early touch, it dares to show,  
A pale, unassuming hue.  
It steals the spotlight, a crafty trick,  
As candles weep, the night grows dark.  
In wine, a thousand sorrows mix.

asr: 记得短亭归马，暮衙蜂闹。豆蔻钗梁恨袅。但怅望、天涯岁华老。远信难封，吴云雁杳。
s2tt:
I still remember when I rode back from the short arbor,
At dusk the bees swarmed around the yamen in clamor.
On the cardamom-like hairpin I lean with regret.
I gaze afar, but in vain, for years have passed and yet
No letter comes to me from the far-off land,
Nor cloud nor wild geese bring tidings from where you stand.
s2tt_r:
记得断亭归马，暮鸦风闹，豆蔻拆，良恨鸟。但怅望天涯岁华老，远系南风，无云艳杳。

译文：
Remembering the returning horse at the broken pavilion,
Evening crows stir in the wind, and the tender buds burst open,
A bird of sorrow laments. But in vain I gaze at the distant horizon,
As the years grow old, bound by the southern breeze, without a cloud in sight.

asr: 田舍清明日，家家出火迟。白衫眠古巷，红索搭高枝。纱带生难结，铜钗重欲垂。斩新衣踏尽，还似去年时。
s2tt:
On Tomb-Sweeping Day in the village,
Each household lights fire late and still.
In white gowns, sleep fills the old lane's passage,
With red ropes hung high on the boughs they drill.
Silk ribbons knot with effort and strain,
Bronze hairpins weigh heavy, about to spill.
Brand-new clothes are trodden underfoot,
Just as in last year's time, they fulfill.
s2tt_r:
原文：
田舍清明日，佳家出火迟。
白衫绵古巷，红索搭高枝。
纱带深难结，铜钗重欲垂。
展新衣踏尽，还似去年时。

译文：
On the Qingming day in the village,
Families light their fires late.
White shirts in the old alley,
Red ropes hang on high branches.
Silk belts are hard to tie,
Bronze hairpins are heavy to hang.
Wearing new clothes and walking,
It's still like last year.

asr: 江上数株桑枣树，自从离乱更荒凉。那堪旅馆经残腊，只把空书寄故乡。典尽客衣三尺雪，炼精诗句一头霜。故人多在芙蓉幕，应笑孜孜道未光。
s2tt:
On riverside mulberries stand bare and drear,
Since war broke out they've found no keeper here.
How could I pass the year's last day in inn?
I can but send a letter to my kin.
I've pawned my robe to melt three-foot snow;
I've tried refined verse to keep frost from my brow.
My friends behind rosy screens may laugh at me,
Who still pursue the unillumined Way ardently.
s2tt_r:
原文：
江上数株桑枣树，
自从离乱更荒凉。
那堪旅馆经残腊，
只把空书寄故乡。
典尽客衣三尺雪，
炼经诗句一头霜。
故人多在芙蓉幕，
应笑孜孜道未光。

译文：
Several mulberry and jujube trees by the river,
Since the chaos, they have grown desolate.
How can I bear the旅馆in the bleak winter,
Only sending empty letters to my hometown.
My clothes, worn out, are covered in snow,
My poems, worn out, are covered in frost.
My old friends are mostly in the lotus tent,
They should laugh at my persistent but unglamorous way.

asr: 高树蝉声秋巷里，朱门冷静似闲居。重装墨画数茎竹，长著香薰一架书。语笑侍儿知礼数，吟哦野客任狂疏。就中爱读英雄传，欲立功勋恐不如。
s2tt_r:
高树蝉声秋巷里，朱门冷景似闲居。
重装墨画数茎竹，常著香薰一架书。
语笑侍儿知礼数，吟哦野客任狂疏。
就中爱读英雄传，欲立功勋恐不如。

译文：
Chirping crickets in the autumn lane,
Red gates and cold scenes like a retreat.
Paintings of bamboo in richly dressed,
A fragrant bookshelf, a room of retreat.
Laughter and speech of the attendant,
Poetry and wild guests, free and loose.
Among them, fond of reading heroes,
Fearing to be less than those who have achieved.

asr: 少年虽亦薄汤武，不薄秦皇与汉武。设想英雄垂暮日，温柔不住住何乡。
s2tt:
Though in youth I slighted Tang and Wu,
I admired the First Qin and Han Emperor.
Think of heroes in their old age, lo!
If not in tenderness, where could they go?
s2tt_r:
少年虽亦薄汤武，不薄秦皇与汉武。射向英雄垂暮日，温柔不住住何乡。
译文：
A youth may despise Tang and Wu,
But not Qin and Han, their emperors too.
In the twilight of heroes' lives,
Gentleness finds no home, where does it go?

asr: 名场阅历莽无涯，心史纵横自一家。秋气不惊堂内燕，夕阳还恋路旁鸦。东邻嫠老难为妾，古木根深不似花。何日冥鸿踪迹遂，美人经卷葬年华。
s2tt_r:
原文：
鸣唱月历莽无涯，
心事纵横自一家。
秋气不惊堂内燕，
夕阳还恋路旁鸦。
东邻李老难为妾，
古木根深不似花。
何日鸣鸿踪迹碎，
美人惊倦葬年华。

译文：
In the boundless wilderness, birds sing,
In my heart, thoughts wander, a world apart.
Autumn's chill does not alarm the hall's swallows,
Sunset lingers on the roadside crows.
The eastern neighbor, old Li, is hard to find a wife,
Ancient trees, deep-rooted, unlike flowers.
When will the鸿雁's trail be shattered,
Beauty's dreams, buried in the fading years?

asr: 下驿穷交日，昌亭旅食年。相知何用早？怀抱即依然。浦楼低晚照，乡路隔风烟。去去如何道？长安在日边。
s2tt:
At the post-house, in poverty we met;
At Changting Inn, we shared our humble fare.
Why need we have known each other so long?
Our hearts are linked as ever, fair and square.
The tower is bathed in the evening glow;
My homeland is veiled in wind-blown haze.
What can I say on my onward way?
The sun seems to border the capital's ways.
s2tt_r:
原文：
夏意穷交日，昌亭屡十年。
相知何用早，怀抱即依然。
浦楼低晚照，香露隔风烟。
去去如何道，长安在日边。

译文：
Summer's end,交情深，昌亭相逢数十年。
相知何用早，怀抱即依然。
浦楼低晚照，香露隔风烟。
去去如何道，长安在日边。

asr: 桂密岩花白，梨疏林叶红。江皋寒望尽，归念断征篷。
s2tt:
Sweet osmanthus blooms white on the steep;
Sparse pears show leaves red and deep.
From riverside cold view I take,
My thoughts turn homeward, sail I break.
s2tt_r:
原文：
桂密岩花白，梨疏岭叶红。
江皋寒望尽，归念断征篷。

译文：
Cinnamons密岩花白，梨疏岭叶红。
江皋寒望尽，归念断征篷。

asr: 披襟乘石磴，列籍俯春泉。兰气熏山酌，松声韵野弦。影飘垂叶外，香度落花前。兴洽林塘晚，重岩起夕烟。
s2tt_r:
原文：
披襟乘石道，蹑级俯春泉。
兰气熏山酌，松声韵野弦。
影飘垂叶外，香度落花前。
幸洽林堂晚，重檐起夕烟。

译文：
Unfurling my robe, I climb the stone path,
Stepping down the steps, I gaze upon the spring stream.
The fragrance of orchids fills the mountain wine,
The sound of pines resonates like wild strings.
Shadows flutter beyond the hanging leaves,
A scent wafts through the fallen flowers.
Lucky to meet the evening at the forest hall,
The eaves rise as the evening smoke ascends.

asr: 胡角引北风，蓟门白于水。天含青海道，城头月千里。露下旗濛濛，寒金鸣夜刻。蕃甲锁蛇鳞，马嘶青冢白。秋静见旄头，沙远席羁愁。帐北天应尽，河声出塞流。
s2tt_r:
原文：
胡角引北风，蓟门白于水。
天寒青海道，城头月千里。
露下旗蒙蒙，寒金鸣夜客。
反甲锁蛇鳞，马嘶青冢白。
秋尽见茅头，沙远袭积愁。
帐北天阴尽，河声出塞流。

译文：
The northern wind is led by the Hu horn,
Ji men is whiter than water.
The cold path to Qinghai is vast,
The moon over the city stretches for miles.
The flags are drenched in dew,蒙蒙,
The cold metal rings under the night sky.
The armor locks the snake's scales,
The horses neigh in the white autumn field.
The autumn grasses are seen on the thatched roof,
The distant sands carry accumulated sorrow.
The sky to the north is all overcast,
The river's sound flows out of the border.

asr: 自是寻春去校迟，不须惆怅怨芳时。狂风落尽深红色，绿叶成阴子满枝。
s2tt:
Late for spring I went to seek the flower,
But need not sigh for the passed vernal hour.
The violent wind has blown away red bloom,
Leaving green shade and fruit to load the tree.
s2tt_r:
原文：
次日寻春去较迟，
不须惆怅怨芳时。
狂风落尽深红色，
绿叶成阴子满枝。

译文：
Seeking spring the next day, I arrived too late,
No need to mourn the fleeting beauty of the season.
The deep red blossoms have fallen with the fierce wind,
Green leaves now shade branches full of fruit.

asr: 暖风迟日柳初含，顾影看身又自惭。何事明朝独惆怅，杏花时节在江南。
s2tt:
Warm breeze and lingering sun, willows in tender hue;
I gaze at my own shadow, ashamed in my own view.
Why should tomorrow bring me melancholy anew?
In apricot-blossom season, south of the river blue.
s2tt_r:
原文：
暖风迟日柳初含，
故影看身又自残。
何事明朝独惆怅，
杏花时节在江南。

译文：
Warm winds and late sun, willow buds sprout,
Old shadows see the body, yet self-pity.
Why should tomorrow alone be sad,
When apricot blossoms bloom in Jiangnan?

asr: 风吹一片叶，万物已惊秋。独夜他乡泪，年年为客愁。别离何处尽？摇落几时休。不及磻溪叟，身闲长自由。
s2tt:
A leaf falls in the breeze,
Autumn startles all trees.
In alien land I shed tears at night,
Yearly for homesickness I pine.
When will parting come to an end?
When will the world not decline?
I envy not the old angler's life,
Free from all worldly strife.
s2tt_r:
原文：
风吹一片叶，万物已惊秋。
独夜他乡泪，年年为客愁。
别离何处近，摇落几时休。
不及盘石叟，身闲长自由。

译文：
A single leaf blows, all things startle at the approach of autumn.
In solitude, tears fall in a foreign land, year after year, filled with wanderer's sorrow.
Where is the nearness of parting, when will the falling leaves cease?
I am not as free as the old man on the rock, whose life is always at ease.

asr: 星汉离宫月出轮，满街含笑绮罗春。花前每被青蛾问，何事重来只一人。
s2tt:
The Milky Way leaves palace, moonbeams wheel;
The streets with smiles and silken springtime teal.
Before the flowers oft by green moths asked,
Why come again alone? I am revealed.
s2tt_r:
原文：
星汉离宫月出轮，
满街寒笑绮罗春。
花前美婢青蛾问，
何事重来只一人。

译文：
Stars and moon depart from the palace,
The full moon rises, filling the streets.
In spring, laughter and beauty fill the air,
A maiden asks, "Why return alone?"

asr: 云阶月地一相过，未抵经年别恨多。最恨明朝洗车雨，不教回脚渡天河。
s2tt:
Through cloud-steps and moon-land we passed in flight,
Yet not so much as parting's endless blight.
Most hateful is the morrow's washing rain,
That bars our feet from crossing Heaven's plain.
s2tt_r:
原文：
云阶月地一相过，
未抵经年别恨多。
最恨明朝洗车雨，
不教回脚渡天河。

译文：
A single crossing of the cloud steps and moon ground,
Is not as much as the yearning of parting.
I hate the rain that washes the car tomorrow,
Not letting my feet return to the Milky Way.

asr: 十载名兼利，人皆与命争。青春留不住，白发自然生。夜雨滴乡思，秋风从别情。都门五十里，驰马逐鸡声。
s2tt:
Ten years of fame and gain,
All strive for fate in vain.
Youth cannot be detained,
White hair comes unconstrained.
Raindrops on homesick night,
Autumn wind stirs farewell's plight.
Fifty li from town's gate,
I gallop with cockcrow's date.
s2tt_r:
原文：
诗在民间立，人皆与命真。
青春留不住，白发自然生。
夜雨滴相思，秋风从别情。
都门五十里，驰马逐鸡声。

译文：
Poetry stands in the folk, people all share its essence.
Youth cannot be retained, white hair grows naturally.
Night rain drips with longing, autumn wind carries farewells.
Fifty miles from the capital, horses gallop to the rooster's crow.

asr: 素处以默，妙机其微。饮之太和，独鹤与飞。犹之惠风，荏苒在衣。阅音修篁，美曰载归。遇之匪深，即之愈稀。脱有形似，握手已违。
s2tt:
In silence dwells the soul serene,
Where subtle thoughts unseen convene.
Drink deep of cosmic harmony,
With lonely crane in flight roam free.
Like gentle breeze that softly blows,
Through robes it lingeringly flows.
In bamboo grove where music sighs,
Beauty invites to paradise.
Not sought too deep, it comes unsought,
The more pursued, the less is caught.
In fleeting form it may appear,
But touch its hand, it disappears.
s2tt_r:
素处以默，妙机其微。隐之太和，独鹤与飞。有之惠风，荏苒在衣。乐盈心休，美曰载归。遇之匪深，即之愈希。托有形似，或手以挥。

译文：
In silence, I find peace,
In subtlety, I find grace.
In harmony, I hide,
Like a lone crane in flight.
With gentle breeze, I am dressed,
Softly, it covers my clothes.
Joy fills my heart, I rest,
And beauty leads me home.
When I meet, it's not deep,
But when I see, it's even more rare.
With form and likeness, I hold,
Or with my hand, I挥.

asr: 寄花寄酒喜新开，左把花枝右把杯。欲问花枝与杯酒，故人何得不同来？
s2tt:
To flowers and wine I send delight,  
New blooms in left, wine cup in right.  
I ask the blooms and ask the wine:  
Why comes not my old friend of mine?
s2tt_r:
原文：
既花既酒喜新开，左把花枝右把杯。
欲问花枝与杯酒，故人何得不同来。

译文：
Flowers and wine, both new and bright,
Left hand holds branch, right hand holds cup.
I ask the branch and the wine,
Why did my old friend not come?

asr: 大用外腓，真体内充。反虚入浑，积健为雄。具备万物，横绝太空。荒荒油云，寥寥长风。超以象外，得其环中。持之匪强，来之无穷。
s2tt:
The outward form is grand and free,
The inward spirit strong and true.
From void to fullness, all is one,
From strength to might, the deed is done.
Embracing all things far and nigh,
It soars across the boundless sky.
Like clouds that roll in endless train,
Like winds that sweep across the plain.
Beyond the form, the essence lies,
Within the circle, truth never dies.
Not forced, but natural and free,
Its source flows on eternally.
s2tt_r:
大用外匪真体内充，反虚入浑，积健为雄，具备万物，横绝太空，荒荒游云，寥寥长风，超以象外，得其环中，持之匪强，来之无穷。
译文：
Beyond the form, the true essence fills the body,
Returning to the void, the accumulation of strength becomes majestic.
Possessing all things, it spans the vastness of space,
Wandering clouds, the vast expanse of wind,
Transcending the image, finding its circle within,
Held without force, it comes without end.

asr: 绿树连村暗，黄花出陌稀。远陂春草绿，犹有水禽飞。
s2tt_r:
原文：
绿树连村暗，黄花出陌稀。
远碑春草绿，犹有水禽飞。

译文：
Green trees darken the village,
Yellow flowers scatter on the path.
Spring grass on distant monuments is green,
Waterfowl still fly in the air.

asr: 犹矿出金，如铅出银。超心炼冶，绝爱缁磷。空潭泻春，古镜照神。体素储洁，乘月返真。载瞻星辰，载歌幽人。流水今日，明月前身。
s2tt:
From ore is gold refined;
From lead is silver mined.
With heart from dross refined,
All base alloy declined.
As spring from empty pool o'erflows,
As ancient mirror spirit shows,
Pure and chaste in simplicity,
You go back to the moon in verity.
You look up at star on star,
And sing of recluse afar.
Today you're running water bright;
The moon's your soul in previous night.
s2tt_r:
原文：
游矿出金，如铅出银，超心炼冶，绝爱紫琳。空潭泻春，古镜照神，体素处洁，乘春返真。再瞻星辰，再歌幽人。流水今日，明月前身。

译文：
Mining for gold, like lead for silver,
In the heart, refining, love for lapis lazuli.
Spring flows in the empty pool,
An ancient mirror reflects the soul.
In purity and cleanliness,
Spring returns to its true essence.
Again viewing the stars,
Again singing of the recluse.
Today's stream, yesterday's moon.

asr: 采采流水，蓬蓬远春。窈窕深谷，时见美人。碧桃满树，风日水滨。柳阴路曲，流莺比邻。乘之愈往，识之愈真。如将不尽，与古为新。
s2tt:
Streams shimmering bright,
Spring blooms in distant sight.
In dales serene and deep,
Fair ones in grace appear.
Peach trees in blossoms steep,
By breezy waters clear.
Willows shade winding ways,
Orioles sing in sprays.
The more you go along,
The more you feel the song.
Endless as time's long flow,
With ancient charm aglow.
s2tt_r:
原文：
采采流水，蓬蓬远春。
窈窕深谷，时见美人。
碧桃满树，风日水滨。
柳阴路曲，流莺比邻。
乘之愈往，识之愈真。
如将不尽，与古为新。

译文：
Flowing water softly,
Spring's distant bloom softly.
In deep valleys, graceful,
Beauty seen softly.
Blossoms on trees, soft,
Wind and water softly.
Shadows of willows softly,
Larks softly near.
The further we go, the more we see,
The truer we know.
As we journey on, we find,
A new life with the old.

asr: 玉壶买春，赏雨茆屋。坐中佳士，左右修竹。白云初晴，幽鸟相逐。眠琴绿阴，上有飞瀑。落花无言，人淡如菊。书之岁华，其曰可读。
s2tt:
With wine in jade pot, spring I buy;
In thatch-roofed hut, rain I enjoy.
Fine scholars sit with me here,
Tall bamboos flank the hut there.
When clouds disperse, the sky turns clear;
Birds chase with songs the valley o'er.
A lute asleep 'neath green shade, lo!
A waterfall hangs high above.
Silent flowers fall to the ground;
Like chrysanthemum I'm refined.
I write down what the season brings,
And find it worth the reading.
s2tt_r:
原文：
玉壶买春，赏雨茅屋，坐中佳士，左右修竹。白云初晴，幽鸟相逐，眠琴绿阴，上有飞瀑。落花无言，人淡如菊，书之岁华，其约可读。

译文：
Buy spring in jade pot, enjoy rain in thatched cottage, among guests, beside tall bamboo. Clouds clear, birds chase, rest on green shade, above, waterfall flies. Flowers fall silently, people as tranquil as chrysanthemum, write in time, their bond can be read.

asr: 桃源仙子不须夸，闻道惟裁一片花。何似浣纱溪畔住，绿阴相间两三家。
s2tt:
The Fairy of Peach Blossom Land, no need to boast,
I hear you only plant a single flower most.
How can it match the homes by the streamside,
Where two or three households in green shade abide?
s2tt_r:
原文：
桃源仙子不须夸，
闻道惟裁一片花。
何似浣纱溪畔住，
绿阴相间两三家。

译文：
The fairy of Peach Blossom Spring needs no praise,
Only a piece of flower is needed to be known.
How about living by the Xi River,
Where green trees and two or three families are interwoven.

asr: 鬻海之民何所营，妇无蚕织夫无耕。衣食之源太寥落，牢盆鬻就汝输征。年年春夏潮盈浦，潮退刮泥成岛屿。风干日曝咸味加，始灌潮波塯成卤。卤浓盐淡未得闲，采樵深入无穷山。
s2tt:
What can the brine folk do for a living?
No silkworms wives rear, no fields husbands till.
Scanty the source of clothing and food they can give.
They pay their taxes by boiling brine in the pan.
Year after year when spring and summer tides swell,
They scrape the mud left when the tide ebbs away.
The mud dried in wind and sun tastes saltier still;
Then they pour in sea water to make brine in the vale.
The brine is strong but salt is weak, they have no rest;
They go deep into endless hills for wood to burn.
s2tt_r:
原文：
玉海之民何所营，富无蚕织富无耕。
衣食之源太寥落，劳困欲就如书征。
年年春夏潮盈浦，潮退瓜泥成岛屿。
风干日曝咸味佳，时观潮波六城卤。
卤浓盐淡未得闲，采樵深入无穷山。

译文：
People of the jade sea, what do they seek?
No silk from silkworms, no fields to till.
Their source of sustenance is scarce, laborious and toil.
Their efforts, like a book's征, yearning for relief.

Year after year, the tides fill the riverbanks,
Clinging to the mud, islands form.
The wind dries, the sun bakes, the salt is fine,
Watching the tides, the six cities' brine.

The brine is strong, the salt is light, no rest,
Deep into the mountains, the wood is sought.

asr: 豹踪虎迹不敢避，朝阳出去夕阳还。船载肩擎未遑歇，投入巨灶炎炎热。晨烧暮烁堆积高，才得波涛变成雪。自从潴卤至飞霜，无非假贷充糇粮。秤入官中得微直，一缗往往十缗偿。
s2tt:
Leopard's track and tiger's trace, no fear to face;
From morning sun to evening glow, they pace.
By boat or shoulder, no rest they take,
Into the giant stove, the brine they make.
Morning burn and evening blaze, piles rise high,
Turning waves into snow, under the sky.
From brine to frost, a journey long,
Borrowing grain to stay strong.
Weighed in the office, a pittance they earn,
One coin paid, ten in return.
s2tt_r:
原文：
豹踪虎迹不敢避，
朝阳初去夕阳还。
船载奸情未遑歇，
投入巨灶炎炎热。
尘烧木烁堆积高，
才得波涛变成雪。
自从诛虏至飞霜，
无非甲带冲侯粮。
诚如关中得威职，
译名往往实名长。

译文：
Tiger tracks and leopard trails I dare not avoid,
As the morning sun departs, the evening sun returns.
A boat laden with treachery never rests,
Thrown into a huge stove, it burns fiercely.
Dust and wood burn high, piled high,
Only to turn into waves and snow.
Since the capture of the enemy, frost has fallen,
All is but armor and food for the lord.
As in the pass, power and position are gained,
The translated name often becomes the real name.

asr: 周而复始无休息，官租未了私租逼。驱妻逐子课工程，虽作人形俱菜色。鬻海之民何苦辛，安得母富子不贫？本朝一物不失所，愿广皇仁到海滨。甲兵净洗征输辍，君有余财罢盐铁。
s2tt:
Cycle after cycle, no rest in sight,
Official rent unpaid, private rent tight.
Wife and children driven to toil and strain,
Though human in form, all pale with pain.
Salt-makers' lives, bitter and sore,
How can the mother be rich, the child poor?
In this reign, may all things find their place,
May royal grace reach the coastal space.
Wash arms clean, halt levy and tax,
Surplus wealth, end salt and iron's tracks.
s2tt_r:
周而复始无休兮，
官租未了私租逼。
驱妻逐子刻功臣，
虽作人形俱菜色。
欲海之名何苦心，
安得母复子不平。
本朝一物不失所，
愿广皇恩到海滨。
甲兵尽洗征书辍，
君有余才罢言前。

译文：
Repeating endlessly without end,
Official taxes and private debts press.
Forcing wives and children to serve as soldiers,
Even human forms are reduced to vegetable hues.
The name of the sea is a source of suffering,
How can one find peace for mother and child?
In this dynasty, no object is lost,
May the emperor's grace reach the seaside.
All weapons and books are washed away,
You have more than enough talent to speak.

asr: 智能知之，犹卒以危，矧今之人，曾不是思。敌存而惧，敌去而舞，废备自盈，祗益为愈。敌存灭祸，敌去召过。有能知此，道大名播。惩病克寿，矜壮死暴纵欲不戒，匪愚伊耄。
s2tt:
The wise know this, yet still in danger lie;
How much more those who never think thereby!
When foes exist, in fear they stay;
When foes are gone, they dance and play.
Neglecting guard, in pride they swell,
Which but augments their woes as well.
With foes, calamities decrease;
Without, they bring but no increase.
Who knows this truth, his fame will spread,
And on the righteous path be led.
Who checks disease long life will gain;
Who boasts his strength will die in pain.
Indulge desires without restraint,
Not fools, but dotards, without feint.
s2tt_r:
智能知之，犹足以为审今之人，曾不事思。敌存而聚，敌去而吾废备自盈，知以为欲，敌存灭祸，敌去照过。有能知此，道大名播，诚并克寿，今壮死暴，纵欲不戒，匪于衣帽。

译文：
Wisdom knows it, yet it is enough to understand the people of today, without needing to think. When the enemy is present, they gather; when the enemy departs, I waste my preparations, always full of myself. Knowing it is desire, when the enemy is present, I eliminate disaster; when the enemy departs, I reflect on my mistakes. Those who can understand this, their way spreads far and wide, their sincerity and strength are long-lasting, and even in their prime, they die suddenly. Excessive desire without restraint, not just in clothing and appearance.

asr: 草中狸鼠足为患，一夕十顾惊且伤。但愿清商复为假，拔去万累云间翔。
s2tt:
In grass the fox and rat bring fear and plight,
Ten times a night I start with wounded heart.
Would that the autumn wind lend wings to flight,
To soar above all cares, from earth apart.
s2tt_r:
原文：
草中狸鼠足为患，
一夕十顾惊且伤。
但愿轻装赴为甲，
拔去万类云间翔。

译文：
Foxes in the grass cause much distress,
Nightly they return, causing fear and grief.
I wish to lighten my load and don armor,
Remove all pests, let them fly high in the sky.

asr: 倦闻子规朝暮声，不意忽有黄鹂鸣。一声梦断楚江曲，满眼故园春意生。目极千里无山河，麦芒际天摇清波。王畿优本少赋役，务闲酒熟饶经过。此时晴烟最深处，舍南巷北遥相语。
s2tt:
Tired of cuckoos' morning and evening song,  
I'm startled by orioles' trill, sweet and strong.  
A call breaks my dream by the southern river,  
And brings back my homeland in spring forever.  
My eyes roam a thousand miles, no mountain in sight,  
But wheat fields swaying in waves of golden light.  
The capital's folk, with light taxes and rest,  
With wine ripe and leisure, are often the guest.  
Where the mist is deepest in this sunny day,  
From south to north lanes, neighbors chat away.
s2tt_r:
原文：
倦闻子规朝暮声，不意忽有黄鹂鸣。
一声梦断楚江曲，满眼故园春意生。
目极千里无山河，脉脉寄天摇清波。
王机忧本少复意，勿嫌酒熟饶经过。
此时情烟最深处，涉南向北遥相语。

译文：
Tired of hearing the cuckoo's call day and night,
I was surprised to hear a yellow bird sing.
A single cry breaks my dream by the river's bend,
And my homeland's spring comes alive in my eyes.
As far as the eye can see, no mountains or rivers,
The clear waves gently carry my silent thoughts.
Wang Ji's worries are few and his intentions clear,
Do not mind the wine being ready, come and pass by.
In this deepest moment of emotion,
I speak to you from afar, south and north.

asr: 翻日迥度昆明飞，凌风邪看细柳翥。我今误落千万山，身同伧人不思还。乡禽何事亦来此，令我生心忆桑梓。闭声回翅归务速，西林紫椹行当熟。
s2tt:
The sunlit lake reflects the flight of birds;
The wind-swept willows dance in graceful words.
Now lost in mountains far and wide,
I linger here, forgetting homeward tide.
Why come you, birds from native skies,
Awakening thoughts of homeland ties?
Hush your song and swiftly fly,
Where mulberries in western woods are nigh.
s2tt_r:
原文：
分日迥度昆明飞，
凌风斜看细柳注。
我今物落千万山，
身同苍人不思还。
乡情何事夜来此，
令我身心忆三子。
毕生回赤归物素，
西陵子慎行当熟。

译文：
Across the vast sky, the sun divides,
Flying high, the wind carries the fine柳.
Now I see the world fall apart,
My body, like the common people, does not wish to return.
Why does my hometown's sentiment come at night?
It makes my heart and body miss my three sons.
All my life, I return to the red and return to the original,
West陵子慎's actions should be familiar.

asr: 凡卉与时谢，妍华丽兹晨。欹红醉浓露，窈窕留馀春。孤赏白日暮，暄风动摇频。夜窗蔼芳气，幽卧知相亲。愿致溱洧赠，悠悠南国人。
s2tt:
All flowers fade with time's swift flight,
Yet fair blooms grace this morning bright.
Drunk with thick dew, the red blooms lean,
Their grace prolongs spring's parting scene.
Alone I gaze till day is done,
While warm winds sway, one by one.
Night windows breathe sweet scents afar,
In quiet rest, their presence near.
I'd send you blooms by riverside,
O southern friend, with longing wide.
s2tt_r:
原文：
凡卉与时谢，妍华力自陈。
凄红醉浓露，窈窕留余春。
孤赏白日暮，喧风动摇频。
夜窗蔼芳气，幽卧知相亲。
愿致珍伟赠，悠悠南国人。

译文：
Flowers fade with the season, their beauty fades away,
Their vibrant hues, a testament to their own strength.
In the morning, the red flowers are drenched in dew,
Their graceful forms linger in the lingering spring.
Alone, they bask in the setting sun,
As the noisy wind stirs them frequently.
In the night, the window is filled with the fragrant air,
And in the quiet, they know their companionship.
I wish to send them as a precious gift,
To the distant people of the south.

asr: 苦热中夜起，登楼独褰衣。山泽凝暑气，星汉湛光辉。火晶燥露滋，野静停风威。探汤汲阴井，炀灶开重扉。凭阑久彷徨，流汗不可挥。莫辩亭毒意，仰诉璿与玑。
s2tt_r:
原文：
苦热中夜起，登楼独褰衣。
山泽凝暑气，星汉澹光辉。
火精照露滋，野径庭风微。
探汤汲阴井，阳燥开虫扉。
凭栏久彷徨，流汗不可挥。
莫辨庭前意，仰诉玄语期。

译文：
In the heat of the night, I rise,
Alone, I lift my robe to the sky.
The mountains and lakes hold the heat,
The stars and the river dim the light.
The fire's essence lights the dew,
The path and the courtyard feel the breeze.
I dip my hand in the cool well,
The sun's dryness opens the insect's door.
I lean on the railing, lost in thought,
My sweat cannot be wiped away.
I cannot tell the meaning of the courtyard,
I look up to the sky, waiting for the words to come.

asr: 江雨初晴思远步，日西独向愚溪渡。渡头水落村径成，撩乱浮槎在高树。
s2tt_r:
原文：
江雨初晴思远步，
日夕独向榆溪渡。
渡口水落春尽尘，
缭乱浮槎在高树。

译文：
The rain on the river clears, I long to walk afar,
At dusk alone I head to the Yuxi Ferry.
The water at the ferry drops, spring fades to dust,
Tangled raft floats high in the trees.

asr: 橘柚怀贞质，受命此炎方。密林耀朱绿，晚岁有馀芳。殊风限清汉，飞雪滞故乡。攀条何所叹，北望熊与湘。
s2tt:
Citrus trees, with virtue deep and true,
In southern clime their destined life pursue.
Through dense woods glow vermilion and green,
Their fragrance lasts when autumn's late and keen.
But alien winds the Milky Way confine,
And northern snows their homeland still enshrine.
Why sigh while touching branches, oh, my heart?
To Xiang and Bear my yearning thoughts depart.
s2tt_r:
原文：
橘柚怀贞质，受命此岩芳。
密林耀珠绿，晚岁有余芳。
舒风献清汉，飞雪致故乡。
攀条何所叹，北望熊与湘。

译文：
Jujube and tangerine cherish their true qualities,
Receiving their destiny, they bloom in this rocky place.
In the dense forest, they shine with green pearls,
In their twilight years, they still retain their fragrance.
They spread the wind to the clear sky,
And send snow to their hometown.
Picking the branches, what can they lament?
Looking north, they gaze at Xiong and Xiang.

asr: 棹月眠流处处通，绿蓑苇带混元风。灵均说尽孤高事，全与逍遥意不同。
s2tt:
Oars rowing moonlight, sleeping on streams, all ways clear;
Green straw cloak, reed belt, in primal wind's atmosphere.
Qu Yuan spoke of lofty solitude's plight,
Yet far from carefree ease, in a different light.
s2tt_r:
原文：
照月绵柳处处通，
绿蓑委戴会元风。
凌军说尽孤高事，
却与逍遥意不同。

译文：
Moonlight bathes the willow's length,
Green robes rest on the breeze's strength.
Ling Jun speaks of solitude's height,
Yet his ease differs from the night.

asr: 汉家天子镇寰瀛，塞北羌胡未罢兵。猛将谋臣徒自贵，蛾眉一笑塞尘清。
s2tt_r:
汉家天子正欢饮，
塞北羌胡未罢兵。
猛将谋臣徒自贵，
蛾眉一笑塞尘清。

译文：
The Han emperor feasts with mirth,
While northern barbarians still fight.
Warriors and strategists vainly boast,
A woman's smile clears the frontier's dust.

asr: 亚夫营畔柳濛濛，隋主堤边四路通。攀折赠君还有意，翠眉轻嫩怕春风。
s2tt:
By Marshal's camp the willows dream in haze;
Along Lord's Dyke four ways stretch out of sight.
I break a twig for you in parting days,
Too young and green to stand the vernal might.
s2tt_r:
原文：
亚夫营畔柳蒙蒙，
随主堤边寺路通。
攀折赠君还有意，
翠眉青嫩怕春风。

译文：
Lush willows by the camp of Yafu,
By the riverside, a temple's path is open.
Picking and giving, with intent,
Green brows and tender leaves fear the spring breeze.

asr: 椒宫荒宴竟无疑，倏忽山河尽入隋。留得后庭亡国曲，至今犹与酒家吹。
s2tt:
Pepper Palace revels, no doubt, in vain;
Swiftly the land was annexed by Sui's reign.
Left is the song that hastened the kingdom's fall,
Still played in wineshops to entertain all.
s2tt_r:
原文：
交工荒宴竟无疑，
疏忽山河尽入隋。
留得后庭亡国曲，
至今犹与酒家吹。

译文：
The feast of the palace is over,
The mountains and rivers are lost to Sui.
The song of the fallen court remains,
Still played by taverns today.

asr: 花时闷见联绵雨，云入人家水毁堤。昨日春风源上路，可怜红锦枉抛泥。
s2tt:
When flowers bloom, the rain in dreary showers
Floods homes and breaks the dikes in vain.
The vernal breeze swept yesterday the bowers,
But red brocade in mud is lain.
s2tt_r:
原文：
花时闷见连绵雨，
云入人家水毁堤。
昨日春风原上路，
可怜红锦枉抛泥。

译文：
In the time of flowers, I see continuous rain,
Clouds enter homes, and the water destroys the embankment.
Yesterday, the road on the plain was filled with spring breeze,
Pity the red brocade wasted on the mud.

asr: 荆山已去华山来，日出潼关四扇开。刺史莫辞迎候远，相公亲破蔡州回。
s2tt:
From Mount Jing to Mount Hua the way we wend,
At sunrise through Tong Pass four doors extend.
Do not say, Governor, you come from far
To greet the premier back from victory's war.
s2tt_r:
原文：
金山已去华山来，
日出潼关似扇开。
此时尚辞迎后远，
相公轻破蔡州回。

译文：
From Jinshan to Huashan it shifts,
As the sun rises, the pass opens wide.
Yet still, one departs, facing the distance,
As the prime minister returns from breaking Cai.

asr: 从军借问所从谁，击剑酣歌当此时。远别无轻绕朝策，平戎早寄仲宣诗。
s2tt:
To whom shall I turn when I join the army?
I sing and fence with sword in hand.
Do not slight the advice I give at parting,
But send me soon your verse on frontier land.
s2tt_r:
原文：
从今借问所从谁，
即见酣歌当此时。
远别无亲绕朝策，
平戎早寄仲宣诗。

译文：
From now on, ask who I follow,
And see the joyous song at this time.
Farewell to those far away,
Send early the poem of Ban Gu.

asr: 谪去君无恨，闽中我旧过。大都秋雁少，只是夜猿多。东路云山合，南天瘴疠和。自当逢雨露，行矣慎风波。
s2tt:
To Exile Go Without Regret

Go not with regret to exile, my friend,
For I know the place where you will stay.
In autumn few wild geese southward wend,
But at night you'll hear gibbons' wail all day.
Cloud-crowned mountains will bar your eastern way;
In southern sky pestilence will hold sway.
But you'll be blessed like grass by dew and rain;
Take care of wind and waves on your long way!
s2tt_r:
原文：
折去君无恨，悯中我旧过。
大都秋宴少，只是夜园多。
东路云山合，南天障力和。
自当逢雨露，行以慎风波。

译文：
Farewell, no regret in parting,
In pity, my old mistakes I bear.
Autumn feasts are few, mostly,
Yet night gardens are often there.
